loans.name: Oumar

texts.fr:
Monsieur Oumar  né en décembre 1980 à Bananso cercle de Sikasso, il est marié, père de 3 enfants et il réside chez lui-même avec son épouse dans une famille traditionnelle à Loulouni un arrondissement de la région de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative de la république du MALI. 
Monsieur Oumar mène des activités d’achat et de vente des pièces de moto il y'a plus de 6 ans, il s’approvisionne à Sikasso. Il est à son quatrième prêt  individuel avec l’Institution de Microfinance Soro Yiriwaso dans le souci de mieux satisfaire sa clientèle de plus en plus croissante. Les prêts précédant ont été correctement remboursés.  
Ce nouveau prêt lui permettra de faire l’achat des quantités importantes de pièces de moto. Il vend ses pièces de moto dans sa boutique au marché à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes, en détail, au comptant et à crédit. 
Il envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 50.000 francs CFA par mois. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer le prêt et son intérêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en:
Oumar was born in December of 1980 in Bananso, Sikasso Circle. He is married and the father of 3 children. He lives at home with his wife in a traditional family environment in Loulouni, an area in the region of Sikasso, the 3rd administrative district of the Republic of Mali.

Oumar has been buying and selling spare parts for motorbikes for over 6 years. He gets his supplies in Sikasso. He is on his 4th individual loan from the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, so that he can better satisfy his growing clientèle. The previous loan was properly repaid. This new loan will enable him to buy a large quantity of spare parts for motorbikes. He sells the spare parts in his shop located at the market, to a clientèle made up of men and women, for cash or credit. He expects to make an average monthly profit of 50 000 francs. This profit will allow him to repay the loan and its interest and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for motorbikes.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: María de 43 años es casada y tiene una hija de 17 años de edad. María trabaja en su vivienda en donde tiene un pequeño taller de costura en zapatería. Ella tiene un pequeño contrato con una industria de calzado quien le provee de la materia prima y ella realiza la costura a mano en el calzado de hombres y de mujeres. María ha solicitado un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para el encementado toda su vivienda que tiene un área de 40 metros cuadrados. María sabe que deberá cumplir con todas las cuotas que este préstamo implica.
texts.en:
Maria is 43 years old, she is married, and she has a 17-year-old daughter.  Maria works from home where she has a small shoe-making workshop.  She has a small contract with a shoe company in the footwear industry and they provide a lot of the supplies and materials she needs to make men's and women's shoes by hand.

Maria is seeking a loan from FUSAI so that she can buy cement, sand, and gravel so that she can install a floor in her home, which is an area of 40 square meters (430 square feet). Maria will comply with the re-payment schedule of the loan.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and gravel in order to install a floor in her home, which is 40 square meters (430 square feet)

loans.name: Dohoué Aboki's Group

texts.fr: Ce groupe est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. La représentante du groupe, nommée Dohoué (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) âgée de 47 ans n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Dohoué est mariée à un peintre auto du nom de Didier. Le couple a quatre enfants, dont certains scolarisés et trois à leur charge. Dohoué vit avec son mari et son enfant. Les diverses charges de la famille sont supportées par Dohoué et son mari. Pour cette raison, Dohoué vend de la bouillie à base de maïs et des gâteaux à son domicile depuis huit ans. Dohoué s’approvisionne dans un marché du Bénin. Dans le but de renforcer son activité et mieux faire face à la demande de sa clientèle, Dohoué ensemble avec les membres de son groupe sollicite un premier crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
This is a group of three people who live in the same neighborhood. Their representative is Dohoué (with her hand raised in the photo), age 47. Dohoué did not receive a formal education. She is married to a car painter named Didier and the couple have four children, some of whom go to school and three of them still in their care.  


Dohoué lives with her husband and their children, and the couple handle the various household responsibilities together. To that end, Dohoué has been selling maize porridge and cakes from her home for 8 years. She buys her supplies at a market in Benin. 


To strengthen her activity and better meet customer demand, she is seeking a first loan from Alidé together with the other members of her group.

loans.use: to buy maize, sugar and cartons of milk.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is married and has two children. She is from Dimiao, Bohol. She is engaged in a food vending business. 

Rosalie requested a loan, which she will use to buy more ingredients such as meat, vegetables, cooking oil, and seasonings. With this loan, she will be able to cook and sell more thus augmenting her sales and income.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for food vending such as meat, vegetables, cooking oil, and seasonings

loans.name: Gulnigor

texts.ru: Гулнигор жительница столицы Таджикистана, города Душанбе. Ей 41 год. Она замужем и у нее двое сыновей, которым по 14 и 20 лет. Старший сын студент, а младший школьник. Гулнигор зарабатывает на жизнь собственным трудом. Она арендует помещение, где выпекает и продает пирожки с начинками. Этой деятельностью Гулнигор занимается в течение 5 лет. Ее пирожки всегда вкусные и горячие, и поэтому всегда пользуются спросом. Сейчас Гулнигор берет кредит чтобы купить сырьё (муку, растительное масло), а часть сумму кредита она хочет потратить на ремонт квартиры. Этот кредит очень важен для Гулнигор для продолжения деятельности и для улучшения быта.
texts.en:
Gulnigor is a resident of the capital of Tajikistan, the city of Dushanbe. She is 41 years old. She is married and she has two sons, who are ages 14 and 20. Her elder son is a university student and the younger is in school.

Gulnigor earns a living with her own labor. She rents a premises, where she bakes and sells pies will fillings. Gulnigor has been involved in this activity for five years. Her pies are always delicious and hot, and therefore are always in high demand.

Now, Gulnigor is requesting a loan to pay for ingredients (flour, vegetable oil), and a part of the loan she wants to use for repairs to her apartment. This loan is very important for Gulnigor to continue her activities and to improve her life.

loans.use: to pay for raw materials (flour, vegetable oil) for the production of pies, and partly for home renovation

loans.name: Betsaida Group

texts.fr: La cliente Faila est présidente dans le  groupe de credit  Betsaida. Agée de 47 ans, elle est mariée à un homme sans emploie et mère de 7 enfants  qui vont tous à l’école. Vendeuse au grand marché public depuis 1995, elle sollicite ce nouveau prêt pour acheter 3 sacs de 100kgs de manioc.  Son objectif est de construire une jolie maison pour ses enfants. Elle remercie Hekima de promouvoir les femmes pauvres économiquement actives.
texts.en:
Faila is the president of the loan group "Betsaida". Aged 47, she is married to a man who has no work, and she is a mother of seven children who all go to school. Since 1995, she has worked at the public grand market, and she is seeking a new loan to buy three 100-kilogram sacs of manioc.

Her goal is to build a nice house for her children. 

Faila thanks Hekima for promoting the economic activities of poor women.

loans.use: to buy three 100-kilogram sacs of manioc

loans.name: Emma Julia

texts.es: Emma de 65 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su hija de 17 años de edad. Emma se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos. Esta labor la ha realizado desde hace mucho tiempo y con las ganancias que este negocio le deja Emma ha podido salir adelante. Emma menciona que desea comprar madera y lámina galvanizada para construir una nueva galera para el baño y lavadero. Actualmente como se aprecia en la fotografía, los materiales que tiene no prestan la seguridad y durabilidad que se requiere. Por tal razón Emma solicitó un crédito a FUSAI e invertir lo antes posible en la construcción de una nueva galera.
texts.en:
Emma, who is 65 years old, lives in her own house with her 17-year-old daughter. Emma makes a living raising and selling chickens. She has been doing this for a long time and the profits Emma gets from this business have enabled her to get on in life.  

Emma says she wants to buy wood and galvanised sheeting to build a new outbuilding for the toilet and sink. Currently, as you can see in the photo, the structure she already has does not provide the required security and durability. 

This is why Emma asked FUSAI for a loan to build a new outbuilding as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy wood and galvanised sheeting to build an outhouse for the toilet and sink.

loans.name: Berta Elena

texts.es: Berta de 29 años de edad es madre soltera de 2 hijos; una niña de 11 años y un niño de 8 años de edad. A pesar de que solo ella lleva el sustento del hogar, Berta no desmaya en su propósito de sacar adelante a sus dos hijos a quienes tiene estudiando en una escuela pública. Berta de lunes a viernes se dedica a vender verduras en un mercado de su localidad, los sábados y domingos vende sopa de res, pescado y gallina también vende antojitos (enchiladas, papas fritas, pasteles). Berta quiere construir una galera más estable en el área de baño y pila también desea construir las paredes de división del baño, pero no tiene todo el dinero de la inversión. Por lo anterior solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar los ladrillos de barro, cemento, arena y grava para hacer la división del baño y comprar madera y lámina galvanizada para la construcción de una galera.
texts.en:
Berta is 29 years old and she is a single mother of two children - she has an 11-year-old daughter and an 8-year-old son.  Despite being the single provider of her household, Berta is not discouraged in her effort to get by and to help her children get by.  Her children are studying in the public school.  From Monday to Friday she sells vegetables in the local market. On Saturdays and Sundays she sells beef soup, fish, and chicken dishes. She also sells enchiladas, French fries, and pastries.

Berta wants to build a more stable kitchen near the bathroom in her home, and so she needs to create walls to divide the bathroom from the kitchen.  However, she doesn't have the money to pay for the supplies or work.  This is why she's seeking a loan from FUSAI, so that she can buy mud bricks, cement, sand, and gravel in order to separate the bathroom, and to buy wood and galvanized steel sheets for the construction of a kitchen.

loans.use: to buy mud bricks, cement, sand, and gravel to separate the bathroom - also to buy wood and galvanized steel to construct a kitchen.

loans.name: Fátima Leonor

texts.es:
Fátima Leonor es una señora 46 años, casada, madre de cuatro hijos dos de ellos a su cargo en edad escolar.
Habita en el municipio de El Sauce donde nació y creció, se desempeña como maestra de primaria en una escuela ubicada en una comunidad a 7 kilómetros de dicho municipio donde tiene más de diez años de laborar.
Fátima es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que se ha esforzado en su trabajo y por llegar a tener su propia casa aunque le ha costado mucho por todas las adversidades que le ha tocado vivir por ser de escasos recursos como todo Nicaragüense que el salario apenas alcanza para la canasta básica.
Tiene muchos años de trabajar con Ceprodel y ha recibido varios créditos algunos con fondos de los inversionistas de Kiva y se siente muy agradecida por este apoyo que le han brindado porque gracias a estos préstamos ha mejorado las condiciones de su casa, donde hoy tiene un mejor nivel de vida ella y su familia.
Fátima en este momento está solicitando la ayuda de Kiva a través de un préstamo para comprar repuestos para su motocicleta que es su principal medio de transporte para trasladarse hacia su centro de trabajo por lo que le queda alejado de la ciudad, ya que la tiene en el taller en mal estado.
Confía en Dios que le sigan apoyando para poder salir adelante.
texts.en:
Fatima Leonor is 46 years old, married, and the mother of four children; two are school aged.

She lives in El Sauce, where she was born and raised and works as an elementary school teacher at a school located seven miles away.  She’s been working there for more than 10 years.

Fatima is a hardworking woman who has strived in her work and for having a home of her own, even though it has cost a lot because of the adversities she has had to deal with, being from Nicaragua where the salaries are barely enough to pay for food.

She has been with CEPRODEL for many years and has had several loans with Kiva funds and she is grateful for this support because she has improved her living conditions and now has a better quality of life with her family.

Fatima is asking for Kiva assistance to buy repair parts for her motorcycle, which is her principle means of transport to work.  She lives far from the city.  It’s currently at the mechanics shop and in need of repair.  She trusts in God that she will continue to get support so she can come out ahead.

loans.use: to repair her motorcycle.

loans.name: Aziza

texts.en:
Aziza is 30 years old; she is married and has four children. Aziza always strives for the well-being of her family. 

She is going to organize her business. With this aim she took part in a course, ‘To get Ahead’, with a women's organization. She wants to organize a business of animal husbandry. She will feed sheep. She has a cowshed in her house. Her sons will help her with manage the business. 

Aziza is asking for a loan of 600 Somoni to buy cattle. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Khursheda

texts.en: Khursheda was born in 1991. She is single and lives with her parents. Khursheda strives to improve her living conditions and stimulate the economic circumstances of her family. With that goal in mind, she received instruction from the course "Achieve Success," organized by the Association of Businesswomen, and received a certificate. Now she is fully able to organize her own business and become successful in that sphere. She wants to organize a cattle breeding business, as she has experience with this type of business. She plans to use the received earnings to improve her living conditions. She is requesting a loan for 600 somoni to buy cattle in order to organize her new business. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle to organize her new business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 26 años de edad vive en casa de un familiar con su compañera de vida, el se dedica a la elaboración y venta de dulces de conserva de coco, lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de azúcar, coco, saborizantes, empaques, etc. para seguir con sus ventas y así tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su compañera de vida.
texts.en: The client is 26 years old and lives in a relative’s house with his life partner. He works making coconut candy and selling it on the streets. He goes to different neighborhoods near his place of residence, and with this activity he gets the enough income to pay for some of the household expenses. The client is requesting a loan to buy sugar, coconut, flavoring, wrapping, etc. so he can continue with his sales and improve his and his life partner’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sugar, coconut, flavoring, wrapping, etc.

loans.name: Nemassorola Group

texts.fr:
Mariées majoritairement dans des ménages monogamiques, les cinq  membres du groupe Nemassorola ont en moyenne 43 ans et 2 enfants. Elles habitent toutes à Kanadjiguila dans la commune du Mandé / cercle de Kati et se sont connues à travers des liens de voisinage et de leurs activités génératrices de revenu au marché de Kanadjiguila.Les membres du groupe font le petit commerce de, chaussures (hommes et femmes) de meilleures qualités, habits et laits. Dans l’intention d’accroitre leurs fonds de commerce, les membres du groupe ont décidé de collaborer avec Soro Yiriwaso et sont à leur 3ème cycle de prêt solidaire.
Madame Aminata (femme debout en 2ème position de la  gauche vers la droite sur la photo) est une grande vendeuse de, chaussures plastiques (hommes et femmes) de meilleures qualités. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 585 paires de chaussures plastiques de tous les âges à Bamako. La revente se fait en détails à Kanadjiguila en ambulant à une clientèle composée majoritairement de femmes. Madame Aminata compte avoir avec ce prêt un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 95 000 FCFA qui sera utilisé, pour être réinvesti dans l’activité et satisfaire les petits besoins du foyer.
texts.en:
Mostly living in monogamous married households, the five members of the Nemassorola group are on average 43 years old with two children. They all live in Kanadjiguila in the Mandé municipality/Kati Cercle, and know one another through their neighborhoods and businesses in the Kanadjiguila market. The group members have small businesses selling high-quality men's and women's shoes, clothing, and milk.

To increase their business funds, the group members decided to collaborate with Soro Yiriwaso and are on their third group loan cycle.

Aminata (the woman standing second left to right in the photo) is a great saleswoman of high-quality men's and women's plastic shoes. She hopes to use her loan to buy 585 pairs of plastic shoes for all ages in Bamako. She will then resell the shoes in Kanadjiguila on the street to a clientele of mostly women.

With this loan, Aminata expects to earn an average monthly income of 95,000 FCFA which will be used to reinvest in her business and take care of small household needs.

loans.use: to buy plastic shoes.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en: Teodora makes a living through her retail store business. She lives with her family in the town of Trinidad, Bohol.  She sells various dry goods, ranging from children's toys to kitchen materials. This is her main source of income. Teodora is asking for  a loan to buy more stocks to sell, such as toys, kitchen wares, basin, slippers, and others. With this, she will be able to improve her stocks thus allowing her to sell more to her customers. Teodora hopes of making her business a success in the future.

loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell, such as toys, kitchen wares, basin, slippers, and others

loans.name: Mary Juvy

texts.en:
Mary Juvy is a married woman and a mother of four young children from Bohol, Philippines. She has been engaged in a hog raising business for more than 10 years now.

Mary Juvy is asking for a loan to buy feed and vitamins for the pigs. 

With this, she will be able to improve her hog raising business, thus augmenting her profit. 

Mary Juvy hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for the pigs

loans.name: Sokhom

texts.en:
Sokhom is 50 and a widowed mother of two children. She is photographed at the side of her house located in Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. 

Sokhom is in the business of growing rice and raising some poultry to make a livelihood. She has been working in the agricultural business for more than thirty years now. From her current business, she is able to earn well for her family.

Through this new loan, Sokhom would like to buy a piece of land to expand her farming area. Through this, she will be able to improve the productivity of her farm, thus augmenting her harvest and yield. 

With her profit, Sokhom will reinvest in her business, but also take care of her family’s needs. She expresses her thanks to all lenders in advance.

loans.use: to buy a piece of land to expand her farming area.

loans.name: Romula

texts.en: Romula is a married woman and a mother of two children from Cortes, Bohol. Romula runs a food store selling home cooked foods to the people in her locality.This is the source of her income. Romula is asking for a loan  to buy ingredients for food vending like rice, fish, vegetables, meat, cooking oil and seasonings. With this, she will be able to improve her food vending business thus augmenting her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food vending like rice, fish, vegetables, meat, cooking oil and seasonings

loans.name: Melissa

texts.en:
Melissa is a merchant from Guindulman, Bohol. She is a married woman, and has four young children.

Melissa is asking for a loan to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, and others. 

With this, she will be able to improve her stock, thus attracting more buyers. Melissa hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, candies, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries and others

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma is a  married woman and the mother of six children from Dauis, Bohol. She earns a living through her sari-sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her place.
Norma is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise to sell like soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, noodles, canned goods, and others. With this, she will be able to improve the variety of her stocks which allows her to attract more buyers in her store. In the future, Norma hopes of making her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell like soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, noodles, canned goods, and others

loans.name: Ngor

texts.en:
Ngor is a resident from Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is 59 years old and married. Ngor is in the business of rice cultivation on one hectare of her farmland and makes mortar and pestles to sell for additional income. Ngor sells her mortar and pestle products to local traders who come into the village once every two weeks. The business earns her a moderate income, which she usually uses for daily meals, clothing and other costs of commodities. 

Due to insufficient capital to invest in her business, she would like to request a loan to buy raw materials for her mortar production. She hopes the loan will be granted to allow her to continue working with her business and stabilize her household income. She expresses her thanks to all lenders in advance.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her mortar production.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia earns a living offering tailoring services. She is 57 years old, married and lives in Cangbagsa, Larena, Siquijor. She is now well known for the nice quality of services she offers. She has already purchased a new sewing machine and was able to save from it. Her service is self-sustainable and has become profitable, with a net profit of about PHP 3,000 per month.  

Lydia is seeking a PHP 40,000 loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase additional sewing machines for her tailoring services. This is a regular loan, and would be repaid in few  months. In her two previous loans she has never had a delinquency. Lydia is very diligent and loves accuracy which only adds to effective management of her venture.

loans.use: To purchase additional sewing machines.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soap, rice, oil, pepper, etc., to expand the range of sales.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soap, milk, rice, toothpaste and batteries for her business.

loans.name: Yung Un's Group

texts.en:
Yung, 37, lives in a rural village of Kampong Cham province’s Tbaung Khmum district, Cambodia. She is married with no kids.  For the last 19 years, Yung has been working as a garment worker while her husband is a paid construction worker. The current business earns her about 22,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Yung is with VisionFund just for this cycle. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and pay for labor fees. She hopes this loan will enable her to earn more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pay for labor fees

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Tbaung Khmum district

loans.name: Chan Yen's Group

texts.en:
Chan is age 61 and widowed. She is a mother of one kid. To make a living, she has been growing vegetables for almost 12 years. The current business earns her about 47,000KHR per day to meet the family’s need. 

Chan is a first cycle client with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. 

Chan wants to use her portion to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland. 

She hopes this loan will enable her to increase her crop yield so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Zaenal

texts.en:
Zaenal runs a small stall where he sells snacks and mobile phone airtime credits and processes bill payments. He lives west of Bandung, a semi-urban area about three hours from Jakarta. Zaenal is married.

Zaenal began working with Ruma 4 months ago because he wanted to increase his income and business by selling mobile airtime and servicing bill payments. He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. For the last 3 months, he has around $15 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). 

He took a loan for getting a printer from Kiva to support his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments (household electricity payments).

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales and bill payment transactions using printer (buy printer)

loans.name: Dedi

texts.en:
Dedi lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. He manages a small shop selling snacks, drinks and mobile phone airtime credit. Dedi is married and lives with three persons in the family home.

Dedi joined Ruma two months ago because he was interested in selling mobile phone airtime credit. With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Dedi sees improvements in his shop. For the last two months, he has earned an average of $1 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  

He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends. His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends.

loans.name: Cincin

texts.en:
Cincin lives in North of Bogor an semi-urban area about two hours from Jakarta.  Cincin is married and lives with five persons in the family home, as shown in the picture Cincin with her daughter.

Cincin began working with Ruma one month ago because she is interested in the income for selling mobile airtime. She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving bill payments. For the last month, she has around $14 to 15 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). 

As the business runs, she hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital in order to do more transactions on weekends.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends.

loans.name: Arief

texts.en:
Arief lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. He manages a small shop selling mobile phone airtime credit. Arief is single and lives with six persons in the family home.

Arief joined Ruma two months ago because he was interested in selling mobile phone airtime credits. With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Arief sees improvements in his shop. For the last two months, he has earned an average of $3 - $4 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales. 

He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends. His goal for his business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay the price of products for his grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more electrical  products and renovate his workplace.

loans.name: Promise Group

texts.en:
Lydia, age 55, lives in Teshie. She's a member of Promise Group. She is single and has no child. The group is into the sale of bags, slippers, drinks, rice, and eggs.  

For six years, Lydia has been selling bags and slippers. This is her sixth loan with ID Ghana. With this Kiva loan, she will bolster her working capital and buy a large quantity of bags and slippers to sell in order to increase her income.

This is Lydia's second Kiva loan and, therefore, she promises to repay the loan without trouble. The group will hold each other responsible for the repayment of the loan that they are requesting, in the amount of GHS 3,400.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of bags and slippers to sell in order to increase her income.

loans.name: Zeynab

texts.en:
Zeynab is a 50-year-old married woman with a daughter and a son. They are refugees and live in IDP settlement. Her husband is a laborer and gets additional earnings for family. The main source of income is Zeynab’s small bakery. She has been baking bread and lavash for 30 years and this brings her 180 AZN every month.

Zeynab loves her job very much and she is a good professional in this area. She knows ancient recipes of different kinds of bread and lavash. Her bakery is the most famous in the region. Every morning people come to buy bread or lavash for breakfast. They buy lavash to use in cooking of delicious dishes such as qutab.

The bakery of Zeynab is in bad condition. She bakes bread and lavash in a small, unfinished room without any equipment. She uses an old bakery and damaged tools for baking. She applied for 1,500 AZN in order to buy bakery tools and rebuild her bakery. Let’s help Zeynab to make her bakery better!

loans.use: to buy bakery tools and rebuild a bakery

loans.name: Milta

texts.en:
Milta is 38 years old and lives in the town of Rukoki in the Fortportal region of Uganda.  He is married and has five children, with four of them currently in school. For the past five years, Milta has been working hard to manage his retail shop, which sells sodas, detergent, sugar, bananas (matooke), and cooking oil. 

To help expand his business, Milta has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to increase the stock of sodas, detergent, sugar, bananas (matooke), and cooking oil, and will help Milta to generate greater profits and improve on the standards of living. Milta hopes that in the future he will be able to expand more on his business. 

Milta is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Milta who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to increase his stock of sodas, detergent, sugar, bananas (matooke), and cooking oil

loans.name: Gulandom

texts.en: Gulandom is a responsible mother of four children. Year by year, her children require more amenities as they are developing along with a developing world. Her husband's earnings are not enough to provide their family with all of the necessities. Consequently, Gulandom decided to organize a cattle breeding business because she has helped her parents with raising cattle since childhood. She looked for assistance for a long time and finally she heard about the course "Achieve Success," organized by the Association of Businesswomen. She took part in this course and got a lot of useful knowledge out of it. After completing the course, she received a certificate. Now she is ready to start her business, however she does not have money to buy cattle. She will keep the cattle at her house, where she has a large cattle barn. She plans to buy cattle, look after them for several months and then resell them at the local market. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 600 somoni to buy cattle. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle to organize her new business.

loans.name: Mavlyuda

texts.en:
Mavlyuda was born in 1965. She is a careful mother of four children. Mavlyuda is married, and her husband is a kind man. 

She is going to start her own business; she wants to live in good living conditions. Mavlyuda took part in a course, ‘To Get Ahead’, with a women's organization and got a certificate. She is going to start a business of animal husbandry. 

Mavlyuda is asking for a loan of 600 Somoni to buy cattle. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Sokkea

texts.en:
Sokkea is a farmer from Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. She is 22 years old, married, and has two little children. Sokkea has been in the farming business for more than over five years now. She, together with her husband, works hard in order to provide enough for her family. 

The loan that she is requesting is to buy things things like seeds, compost, and fertilizers for her crops and garden so that she can increase her harvest and hence make a lot of sales, in turn giving her enough profit. She wishes to continue working and to be able to give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy things things like seeds, compost, and fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Lucas

texts.en:
Lucas is thirty one years old, married to Mary, and a father of two children. He repairs mobile phones, has a car wash business, and recently he does crop farming.He has been in these businesses for seven years now and gets a monthly income of fifteen thousand shillings.

This will be Lucas second loan with Vision Fund Kenya, and he plans to use the entire loan to buy products like batteries, phone chargers, etc. In the future, he wants to be a prosperous business man.

loans.use: to purchase products like batteries, phone chargers, etc.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
For the last four years, Mary has been operating her business of clothing sales in Nyahururu, from which she has been getting a monthly income of KES. 10,000.

She is 32 years old, married to John, and they are blessed with three children ages 12, nine and two years old. She has applied for her first loan of KES. 30,000 from Vision Fund Kenya, which will be used for buying more stock of clothing to sell to her ever increasing number of customers, thereby increasing her sales and profits.

Mary hopes to use her profits from the expanded business to educate her children, start another business,In the future, she hopes to educate her children to the highest grade possible and to open a bigger boutique where she will be selling assorted clothes in wholesale.

loans.use: To buy more stock of clothes to sell to her customers

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 41 years old and married and together with his wife they are blessed with two children who are currently in school.

Samuel is in the farming business in Ndunyu Njeru, which he has been practicing for 10 years. He has applied for a third loan from VisionFund Kenya to enable him to buy fertilizer and pay for labor expenses during this planting season. With the anticipated profit, he plans to pay back the loan and pay school fees.

In the near future, he hopes to expand his farming business to improve his family's living standards.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pay for labor expenses.

loans.name: Kirinkai

texts.en:
Kirinkai is 35 years old, married to Jennifer and the father of three children. For the last ten years, he has farmed his own piece of land and earned a good income. Wheat has proved to be doing well in his area due to good climatic conditions.

Kirinkai learned about VisionFund Kenya through their staff. This will be his fifth loan after successfully repaying off the previous loans. He plans to buy farm inputs and hire machinery and pay for labor for preparation of the land.  With the profits he hopes to make from the proceeds of this loan, he plans to re-invest in the farm and plant more acres of wheat.

Kirinkai’s future dreams are that he will be able to buy a bigger piece of land, plant more wheat for commercial farming, buy his own farm machinery, and educate his children. He is a hardworking man who is focused on his set goals.

loans.use: to pay for labour for land cultivation as well as buy farm inputs and hire machinery

loans.name: Aida Esperanza

texts.es: Con 36 años de edad Aida está casada y tiene 4 hijos  de 8, 11,16 y 18 años de los cuales uno va al colegio y 2 van la escuela,  Aida se dedica a criar chanchos desde que tenía 16 años, comenta que le va bien en este y que le gustaría mejorar su negocio, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura y a trabajar al jornal, con el crédito va a comprar chanchos los mismos que los cría en una chanchera, la  meta de  Aida es seguir cuidando  adecuadamente a sus animales para que su negocio sea rentable y pagar los gastos de educación y alimentación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
At 36 years old Aida is married and has 4 children who are 8, 11,16 and 18 years old. One of her children goes to secondary school and 2 go to primary school. Aida has made a living raising pigs since she was 16 years old, and says it is going well and that she would like to improve her business. Her husband works in agriculture and as a day laborer. 

With this loan she will buy the same pigs as those that she raises on the pig farm. Aida's goal is to continue to properly care for her animals to make her business profitable and to pay for the costs of education and food for her children.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Muziizi Klezia Tweimukye Group

texts.en:
Priscilla, whose hand is raised, is a member of a village bank where members, because of lack of security, offer to guarantee loans to each other. She is married with one child living in Kyenjojo, Uganda. 

Her main business is buying and selling produce like maize, beans and groundnuts, which she has been doing for four years. She started this business so as to get money to look after her family, as there was a lot of demand in markets in urban centers. She hopes to have a stable income for her young family. Priscilla is faced with a problem of transporting her produce to the market. Priscilla is requesting a loan to buy tomatoes, groundnuts and beans for resale.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, groundnuts and beans for resale.

loans.name: Wyclife

texts.en:
Wycliffe is a 30-year-old man from the western part of Kenya in Kakamega County; he supports three people in his family and is married to Klensia who is also a businessperson. He has three children who are six years, three years and three months old respectively.

Wycliffe has a tailoring center, a business he has been doing for the last ten years and comfortably earns a monthly income of KES 18,000. He is taking his first loan with VisionFund Kenya, which he will use to buy more clothing materials in bulk to boost his  tailoring business. He will use the anticipated profit to plow back into the business.

Wycliffe has a dream of becoming a successful businessman and supports his family.

His dream is to own a shop and educate his children at all levels.

loans.use: to buy clothing materials in bulk to boost his tailoring business

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a 30-year-old married gentleman who supports a family of five people. He has been practicing maize farming for the last three years, earning a monthly income of KES 39,000. 

He is servicing a third loan of KES 65,000 from Vision Fund Kenya, which he intends to use to purchase farm inputs. 

The anticipated profits will be used to diversify into sheep keeping. His dream is to improve his financial stability.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 39 years old from Nyahururu, married to Mercy and blessed with two children aged twelve and two years old.

Simon operates a tailoring business, which he has been doing for ten years earning an income of KES 20,000. He has requested his second loan of KES 20,000 from VisionFund Kenya to buy more clothing materials for expanding his business.This will in-turn boost his business.

Simon anticipates using the profits to pay his loan, educate his children and boost his business.

loans.use: To buy more clothing  materials

loans.name: Siphorn

texts.en:
Siphorn (in photo) is 41 years old and lives in a village about eighteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She has two daughters who attend school. 

Siphorn buys and sells vegetables. She buys vegetables from the Phnom Penh market and transports them by her own motor remolque to sell in her local market. (A motor remolque is a trailer attached to a motorbike at the back.)

When she has free time, she  also sells meatballs from home. Her husband assists his wife in business and he is also a motorcycle taxi driver when he has free time.
 
Siphorn is asking for a loan to buy a new motorcycle for her husband because the one he has is breaking down.

loans.use: To buy a new motorcycle for her husband.

loans.name: Muharram

texts.en: Muharram was born in 1976. She is a hardworking woman. Muharram is married and has 3 children. As her husband has a small income, they live poorly in a rural area. Muharram decided to organize her own business deal and in this way to earn for living. Muharram started her business with growing potatoes 6 months ago. She got a rental land. She wants to develop her new business. With this aim she took part in a course ‘To Get Ahead’ by a women's organization and got a certificate. She is asking for a loan of 600 TJS to buy mineral fertilizers and to pay for rental land. She awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and to pay for rental land for a new business.

loans.name: Savriniso

texts.ru: Савринисо жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина. Она родилась и выросла в семье простого рабочего. С детства она помогала своим родителям по домохозяйству. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж строитель. Савринисо 3 года назад начала свой бизнес изготовлением и продажей печенье, пирожков и т.п. Она постепенно развевает свой бизнес. Савринисо данное время хочет увеличить свой оборотный капитал. Она хочет продавать кроме своей продукции, напитков и мороженное. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 стмони для покупки напитков и мороженное для увеличения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Savriniso is a cheerful and hardworking woman. She was born into and raised in a simple worker's family. From childhood, she helped her parents with the household chores. She is married and is raising three children. Her husband is a builder. Three years ago, Savriniso started her own business of baking and selling cookies, pastries, etc. She is developing her business little by little. Currently, Savriniso wants to increase her working capital. In addition to her basked goods, she wants to sell drinks and ice cream. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 5000 somoni to buy drinks and ice cream to increase her working capital. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy drinks and ice-cream to increase her working capital.

loans.name: Rosmery

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de fotocopiadora,la socia hace trabajos en computadora,la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le v amuy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de fotocopiadora.La socia solicita el credito para comprar papeles y tinta para su fotocopiadora.

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
This member continues with her photocopy and computer business. She has been for several years in this business, and so far she has done well. Her dream is to expand her business. She is requesting a loan to buy paper and toner for her photocopy machine. 

She is thankful for the loan and commits to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy paper and toner for her photocopy machine.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto vive en la hermosa ciudad de Challabamba a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Paucartambo, él es un hombre responsable y amable que saca adelante a su familia con el esfuerzo de su trabajo, él se dedica a la agricultura pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos donde siembra papa, cebada, trigo, manzanas, membrillos y otras cosas más. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo, él continua perteneciendo al banco comunal “Sol Naciente de Mojopata” y esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y fertilizantes. 

Agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. (La ciudad de Challabamba está ubicado en distrito de la Challabamba de la provincia de Paucartambo, Cusco, Perú).
texts.en:
Luis Alberto lives in the beautiful city of Challabamba, which is 15 minutes from Paucartambo.  Luis Alberto is a responsible and friendly man who gets his family ahead through his hard work.  He makes his living in agriculture.  He has a few plots of crop land on which he plants potatoes, barley, wheat, apples, quince and other crops.  Luis Alberto has been farming for a number of years, and it has been going well for him thanks to the effort he puts into his work.  He still belongs to the communal bank “Sol Naciente de Mojopata” and at this time needs a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizer. 

Luis Alberto is grateful for and values the loan.  He promises to very responsibly comply with his monthly repayment plan.  (The city of Challabamba is located in Challabamba District, Paucartambo Province, Cusco, Perú).

loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es:
Diana es estudiante de Ingeniería en Marketing, ella no tiene un trabajo formal, le ayuda a sus padres en la confección de prendas para uniformes de empresas.
Ella comenta que su anhelo es encontrar una empresa en donde pueda poner en práctica sus conocimientos y generar ingresos para poder ayudar a su familia.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas y de esa forma poder seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Diana is studying Marketing Engineering. She does not have a formal job, so she helps her parents with manufacturing business uniforms.

Diana says that her wish is to become associated with a company where she can put her knowledge into practice and generate income so that she can help her family.

She is requesting a loan that she can invest in the payment of her university fees, which will allow her to continue studying.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Prosperidad Y Amistad Group

texts.es: Delia de 48 años de edad es casada con 01 hijo dependiente. Ella forma parte del grupo “Prosperidad y Amistad” y está formado por 06 socios solidarios y responsables. Delia se dedica a la venta de abarrotes. Ella tiene planeado aumentar el volumen de venta de sus productos. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite, azúcar y leche. El grupo “Prosperidad y Amistad” agradecen a los inversionistas Kiva por darles la oportunidad de crecer en sus negocios. Delia es la segunda del lado derecho y viste blusa floreada.
texts.en:
Delia is 48 years old. She is married and has a dependent child. She is a member of the group "Prosperidad y Amistad" [Prosperity and Friendship], which consists of 6 supportive and responsible members. 

Delia makes a living selling groceries. She is planning to increase the volume of sales of her products. She is asking for a loan to buy rice, oil, sugar, and milk. 

The group "Prosperidad y Amistad" is grateful to Kiva investors for giving them the opportunity to grow their businesses. In the picture, Delia is the second from the right, and she is wearing a shirt with a flower pattern.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticide, weed-killer, fertilizer, manure, pest control, among others.

loans.name: Nelita

texts.en:
Nelita is a widow and mother of five children from Guindulman, Boohl. She has been engaged in the food vending business for more than two years now.

Nelita is asking for a loan to buy more ingredients for food vending like flour, sugar, cooking oil, and others. With this, she will be able to improve her business, thus augmenting her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for food vending like flour, sugar, cooking oil and others

loans.name: Mom

texts.en:
Mom, age 50, a resident from a rural village of Prey Chhor district, Kampong Cham province. She is married to Ngeb, an animal trader and a loving father of six grown-up children. Being a responsible mother, who aims to provide them with better living conditions, Mom works as a rice farmer and is also involved in trading natural medicine for additional income. She has been doing this for more than nearly 30 years.

Mom is now asking for a loan from lenders in order to buy cows for fattening for a short time and trading them for profit. This amount will be a great help for Mom and her husband to sustain her family-owned business, and stabilize her economic situation. She expresses her thanks to all Kiva lenders in advance.

loans.use: to buy cows for fattening for a short time and trading them for profit.

loans.name: Paz

texts.en:
Paz is a married woman from Bohol, Philippines. She has four children. Her husband works as a carpenter.

Paz is asking for a loan to buy ingredients for food vending like meat, vegetables, cooking oil, and seasonings. With this, she will be able to cook and sell more, thus augmenting her income.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for food vending like meat, vegetables, cooking oil, and seasonings

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 24 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo, desde hace 2 años posee una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la clienta esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería como: granos básicos, aceite, azúcar, golosinas, refrescos, gaseosas, etc. y así surtir mas su tienda para obtener mejores ganancias para tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This client is 24 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband and her child. As of 2 years ago, she has had a small store located in her place of residence. With the income she makes and the help of her husband they manage to cover some of their household expenses.

This client is asking for a loan to buy more products, such as basic grains, oil, sugar, candy, soft drinks, soda, etc. She will stock her store better to increase her earnings and have a better quality of life for herself and her family.

loans.use: buy basic grains, oil, sugar, candy, soft drinks, soda, etc.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es:
El socio Francisco se dedica al negocio de mecanica automotriz,el socio arregla varios carros,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 5 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de taller mecanico.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas y herramientas.

El socio agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Francisco has a business where he works as an auto mechanic. He repairs different types of cars. Francisco works from 8:00 A.M. to 7:00 P.M. He has been in this business for five years and is doing very well. His dream is to expand his repair business.

Francisco is requesting a loan so that he can buy tires and tools. He is grateful for the loan and promises to complete his installments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy tires and tools.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen de 54 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar  ya que desde pequeña sus padres la pusieron a trabajar, ella es madre soltera porque su esposo la dejo cuando estaba embarazada, tiene una hija la cual depende de ella y también tiene un nieto de quince años de edad que esta estudiando.

Carmen  toda su vida se dedico a cultivar frijol en las faldas de los cerros, este trabajo lo aprendio de sus padres porque desde que tenia 9 años la llevaban a trabajar, ahora es de ella de quien dependen los ingresos de su hogar porque junto a su hija trabajan para que a ellas y a su nieto no les falte lo básico para seguir el la lucha del diario vivir.

La señora Carmen necesita el crédito, para poner una pequeña tienda en su casa, lo cual  le servirá  de gran ayuda ya que tiene problemas reumáticos y le causa fuerte dolor en la piernas casa vez que sube hasta el cerro a ver sus cultivos y si pudiera tener su tienda ya no se esforzara tanto y no tendría esos fuertes dolores y sabe que lo puede lograr solamente con la ayuda del crédito.

El sueño de Carmen es llegar a tener la tienda en su casa para ya no trabajar tanto de sol a sol y poder llegar a tener una mejor vida y asi poder mejorar su casa y sacar a su nieto adelante con sus estudios y que pueda llegar a tener un buen nivel académico dado que ella no lo pudo lograr pero su nieto lo tiene que lograr.
texts.en:
Carmen, who is 54 years old, did not have the opportunity to go to school as her parents made her work from a young age. She is a single mother because her husband left her when she was pregnant. She has a daughter who is dependent on her and she also has a 15-year-old grandson who is at school. 

Throughout her life Carmen has made a living growing beans in the foothills, having learnt the skills from her parents, since they took her to work with them from when she was nine years old. Now she is responsible for providing the household income as she and her daughter work to make sure that they and her grandson have all the basic needs in the daily struggle to survive.

Carmen needs the loan to set up a small shop in her home, which will be a great help to her. She has rheumatic problems and this causes her a lot of pain in her legs every time she goes up the hill to look after her crops. If she could have a shop she would not have to exert herself so much and she would not have this severe pain. She knows that she can manage to do this just with the help of the loan.

Carmen's dream is to set up the shop in her home so she does not have to work as much from dawn to dusk and can have a better life. She wants to improve her house and support her grandson in his studies so he can reach a good level of education, which she was not able to do, but her grandson must do.

loans.use: to set up a small shop in her home.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 32 años de edad, solamente pudo estudiar hasta noveno grado, ahora él está acompañado  y su pareja se dedica a la agricultura, tiene dos hijos que están en la escuela y su abuela vive con ellos. 

Desde que tenñia 10 años, Pedro se dedica a la agricultura, su abuelo le enseñó este trabajo, su padre lo abandonó cuando él solo tenía meses de  nacido por lo que solo su madre lo crió,  ahora es un hombre trabajador y se levanta muy temprano para llegar al lugar de trabajo ya que tiene que caminar 45 minutos, trabaja 6 horas y luego regresa a su casa, además por la tarde se dedica a los cultivos y les enseña a sus hijos cuando regresa de la escuela para que aprendan ell trabajo.

El crédito que Pedro está solicitando será invertido para comprar abono, semilla y veneno.

Sus objetivos y sueños son comprar un terreno y construir su casa, pues hoy vive en casa de su abuela. lograr  que sus hijos estudien y  se preparen para salir adelante, pagar el crédito y tener las  puertas abiertas a créditos futuros.
texts.en:
Pedro is 32 years old and has just a ninth grade education. He is now married and his spouse makes a living in agriculture. He has two children in school and his grandmother lives with him. 

Since he was 10 years old, Pedro has worked in agriculture because his grandfather taught him this type of work. His father abandoned him when he was just a few months old and his mother raised him independently. He is now a hard-working man who gets up early to get to work since he must walk 45 minutes. He works six hours and then returns to his house. In addition, during the afternoon he cares for his crops. When his children get home from school, he teaches them so that they learn to do this type of work. 

Pedro is requesting this loan to buy manure, seeds and poison. His dreams are to buy land and build a house since he currently lives at his grandmother's house, keep his children in school so that they are well-prepared to get ahead, and pay his loan, and keep his doors open to future loans.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds and poison.

loans.name: Pheap

texts.en:
Pheap is a farmer and a resident living in Prey Chhor, Kampong Cham province. She is 33 years old, married and has four children. Pheap has been engaged in a farming business for more than 14 years now. She grows rice on her own farmland, and this is her major source of income for her family.

As of now, Pheap is taking out a loan to add to her existing capital in order to make some home improvements.  Her house, which has been built for years, has deteriorated and needs to be fixed instantly. 

She and her family are very thankful to all the lenders for helping them improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to make some home improvements.

loans.name: Thủy

texts.en:
Thủy has a manufacturing business making mesh nets. Thủy has been involved in this business for six years.

She is 28 years old and she is married, with two children. Thủy lives with two dependents in the Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2007, Thủy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thủy has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Thủy faces in her life is not having a latrine, so her family shares the neighbor's latrine.

She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

In the future, Thủy hopes to remodel her house, to maintain  a successful business, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Roel

texts.en:
Roel is a fish vendor from Bohol, Philippines. He has been in the business for more than a year now. 

Roel is asking for a loan to buy more fish to sell. 

With this, he will be able to sell more, thus augmenting his income and profit.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, fish, meat, onion, etc for her business.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a rural farmer whose farming is on small scale because of a lack of machinery to modernize his agriculture. He is challenged  by the drought that previously affected his area. 

Now that the rains have come, David wants to hire labourers to prepare his farm for sowing. 

He anticipates a bumper harvest at the end of the season. He is a hardworking man.  

Pictured is the client (in the hat) with the Ugafode credit officer during verification.

loans.use: To hire labourers

loans.name: Isaías Antonio

texts.es:
Isaías de 21 años de edad,  es bachiller, actualmente trabaja de empleado en un banco, sus padres dependen directamente de él  vive con ellos y sus otros hermanos, no tiene hijos ya que es soltero.

Isaías es empleado hace seis meses, antes de eso le ayudaba a sus padres a cultivar cereales, solo tiene una actividad, él viaja casi todos los días de su casa a su trabajo, recorre aproximadamente unos ocho kilómetros para llegar a su trabajo.

 Él necesita el crédito, para comprar una motocicleta para transportarse a su trabajo. El crédito le mejorara su calidad de vida, ya que se movilizara con mayor facilidad y podrá desarrollar mejor su trabajo.

Con respecto a sus sueños piensa en casarse y formar un hogar ya que eso siempre lo ha tenido presente , también piensa en seguir estudiando para tener un mejor empleo y mejorar sus ingresos para en el futuro poder construir un vivienda que beneficie a él y a su familia.
texts.en:
Isaías, 21 years old, is a secondary school graduate. Currently he works as a bank employee. His parents directly depend on him. He lives with them and his other siblings. He does not have children since he is single.

Isaías has been an employee for six months. Before that, he helped his parents grow grain. He only has one job. He travels almost every day from his house to his job, covering approximately eight kilometers to arrive at work.

He needs the loan to buy a motorcycle to drive himself to work. The loan will improve his quality of life since he will be able to get around easier and carry out his work better.

Regarding his dreams, he is thinking of getting married and making a home since that is what he's always had in mind. He is also thinking of continuing to study in order to have a better job and improve his income so in the future he can build a house to benefit him and his family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to drive himself to work.

loans.name: Leonidas Oscar

texts.es:
El socio Leonidas Oscar se dedica al negocio de venta de comida,el socio tambien es bombero,el socio vende junto con su esposa diferentes platos como sopas y pollos scon papas,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 7 años en este negocio,el sueño del socio es tener un restaurant.El socio solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo.carne y verduras.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Leonidas Oscar, works selling food, and he is also a fireman. He and his wife sell different dishes such as soups and chicken with potatoes, and he works from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. He has been working in this business for 7 years now, and his dream is to have a restaurant. 

He is seeking a loan in order to purchase products for cooking such as chicken, meat, and vegetables.

The member is happy for the loan and he is committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to purchase products for cooking such as chicken, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es:
Juan de 40 años de edad, es un hombre muy trabajador, desempeña el papel de carpintero, su taller lo tiene en la casa de su padre, Juan hace todo tipo de muebles, los cuales vende para ayudar a su familia, la cual la forma su esposa, su hija de 11 años de edad  y su hijo de 3 años de edad. Su esposa trabaja en un comedor para apoyar en los gastos del hogar. 


Juan se dedica a la carpintería desde los 15 años de edad, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre a quien le agradece porque hoy  en día le sirve mucho para generar ingresos al hogar. Juan solo estudio hasta noveno grado y luego decidió irse para los estados unidos;  pero luego regreso y con el dinero que traía compro más herramientas para seguir trabajando en su taller.


Juan  utilizara el crédito para instalar una tienda en su casa, la cual la atenderá su esposa, quien tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas. La tienda estará surtida con productos de primera necesidad, y así también tendrá a la venta  pequeños artículos de madera, los cuales serán elaborados por él.


Juan sueña con tener un negocio muy grande, en el que pueda tener productos y artículos que son necesarios en el hogar, así también espera que sus hijos puedan seguir estudiando y puedan ser alguien en la vida, que no les falte nada y que puedan tener un hogar, donde puedan vivir y crecer sanamente.
texts.en:
Juan is 40 years old and is a hard-working man who works as a carpenter. He has his workshop at his father's home. He makes all types of furniture, which he sells to support his family, made up of his wife, his 11-year-old daughter and 3-year-old son. His wife works at a restaurant to support the household expenses. 

Juan has worked in carpentry for 15 years. He learned this trade from his father, who he is very grateful to because today it has helped him a lot of generate income for the household. Juan only attended school up to the ninth grade, after which he decided to go to the United States. He returned later on, using the money that he brought with him to buy tools to continue working in his workshop.

Juan will use this loan to install a store in his home, which he will attend to with wife who has a lot of experience in sales. The store will be stocked with basic needs products and small items made from wood that he will make himself. 

Juan dreams of having a larger business in which he can have products and items that are necessary for any household. He also hopes that his children can stay in school and become greater during their lives, that they don't lack anything, and that they can have a home where they can live and grow healthily.

loans.use: to install a shop at his home.

loans.name: La Florida Group

texts.es: Yessica de 27 años de edad  separada con 01 hijo dependiente. Ella pertenece al grupo “La Florida” conformado por 07 socios responsables. Yessica se dedica  a la venta de productos de belleza  gracias a su constante dedicación logró salir adelante. Su mayor anhelo es de poder contar con su propio local donde pueda ofrecer sus productos. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de desodorantes, talcos y perfumes. El grupo “La Florida” agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por hacer posible este crédito. Yessica es la primera del lado derecho, viste polo plomo.
texts.en:
Yessica is 27 years of age, separated, and has one dependent child. She belongs to the group "La Florida" comprised of seven responsible members. 

Yessica sells beauty products and through her continued dedication has managed to get ahead. Her greatest wish is to have your own storefront where she can offer her products. She has requested a loan to buy deodorant, powders and perfumes. 

The group "La Florida" thanks Kiva's investors for making this loan possible. Yessica is the first on the right side, dressed in a grey shirt.

loans.use: to buy deodorants, powders, and perfumes

loans.name: Raul Aristides

texts.es: Raul tiene 44 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 16 años de edad. Raul aprendió el oficio de sastrería desde hace mucho tiempo y es lo que le permite ganarse la vida y llevar el sustento a su familia. Con el fin de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo y de la mejora del piso de la vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y grava.
texts.en:
Raul is 44 years old and lives in his own home with his life partner and his 16-year old child. Raul learned the tailoring trade long ago and it is what allows him to earn a living and support his family. 

In order to improve their living conditions he made ​​the decision to apply for this loan from FUSAI to invest in roof repair and improve the floor of the house. With the amount requested, he will buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, cement, sand, and gravel.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized sheet metal, wood, cement, sand, and gravel to repair the roof of the home and for cementing the floor.

loans.name: Los Angeles De Vitarte Group

texts.es: Reyna   de 42 años de edad separada  y madre de  3 hijos, Reyna  tiene un pequeño negocio(ALQUILADO) de ventas de productos de zapatos (a pedIdo)   ya hace unos 5 años. Reyna,  ha llegado a fidelizar  a sus clientes   el cual le ha generado ganancias para poder cubrir los gastos de su hogar,  En el futuro le gustaría tener un local propio donde poder vender sus productos y obtener mayores ganancias económicas. Con el préstamo otorgado lo invertirá en comprar más productos para su negocio Y así seguir satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus clientes   y así poder salir adelante. A la vez  Reyna y todos los integrantes se encuentran  agradecidos   con Kiva  por el préstamo otorgado   y por la confianza que se  les ha sido brindada. Se le distingue por su polo manga larga de color blanco,se despide  Dejando la promesa  que cumplirá todas sus metas propuestas.
texts.en: Reyna is 42 years old, separated, and has 3 children. Reyna has had a small business (that is rented) that sells shoe products (on request) for 5 years. Reyna has gained loyal customers, which has generated income to cover her home costs. In the future she would like to have her own store where she can sell her products and earn higher profits. With the loan, she will invest in purchasing more products for her business, thus continuing to meet her customers' needs and get ahead. Reyna and all of the members are grateful to Kiva for the loan granted, and for the confidence given to them. Reyna is in the long sleeve white shirt. She concludes with the promise that she will fulfill all of her goals.

loans.use: to sell shoes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemí 57 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica a la venta de pescado seco, comercializa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Noemí está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pescado seco por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas que le generan buenas ganancias y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Noemí, age 57, lives in her own house with her family.  She works selling dried fish, making her sales on foot throughout the different markets near her place of residence. With the earnings that she obtains from her sales she manages to pay for some of her household expenses.

Noemí is requesting a loan for the purchase of wholesale dried fish in order to be able to continue with her sales, as they generate good earnings, and thus provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale dried fish.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
La socia Maura se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,la socia prepara diferentes platos como estofado de pollo,sopas y pollo al horno,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene varios años en est negocio,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restuarant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos como pollo,carne y verduras

La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Maura continues to work in the restaurant business where she prepares various dishes such as chicken stew, soups, and baked chicken. She works from 8 o'clock in the morning until 5 o'clock in the evening. She has been working in this business for many years. Her dream is to expand her restaurant business. 

She is applying for a loan to buy food supplies such as chicken, meat, and vegetables. She is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy food supplies such as chicken, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Emma Jaqueline

texts.es:
Emma de 33 años de edad, estudio solamente hasta el 9° grado, ella es casada, su esposo es cocinero, ellos tienen dos hijos, solamente uno asiste a la escuela y de ella solamente dependen sus hijos.
	

Emma se dedica a realizar las labores del hogar, a cuidar sus hijos y ella cuenta con muchos deseos de superación, y es por ello que tiene 6 meses de haber iniciado la crianza de pollos  de engorde y con ello ayuda a su esposo con los gastos de sus hijos y del hogar.

El crédito será invertido en la compra de concentrado y vitaminas para la nutrición y desarrollo de los pollos de engorde 

El sueño de la señora Emma es ver a sus hijos graduados de la universidad y mejorar la calidad de vida para toda su familia, también desea tener una granja avícola de gallinas ponedoras.
texts.en:
Emma is 33 years old and only attended school to 9th grade.  She is married and her husband is a cook.  They have two children but only one goes to school.  She supports both of them.

Emma is a housewife, cares for her children, and has many desires to succeed.  Six months ago she began raising chickens and this helps her husband with the household expenses.

She will use the money to buy feed and vitamins for her chickens’ development.

Emma’s dream is to see her children graduate from university and improve their quality of life.  She also wants to have a farm for egg-laying chickens.

loans.use: to buy feed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay rent for her new shop.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos nació y vive en la ciudad de Paucartambo. Esta ciudad se característica por tener paisajes hermosos y ser la ciudad folclórica del departamento del Cusco. La mayoría de los pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales. En el mes de julio se celebra la festividad de la virgen de Carmen y llegan de diferentes lugares del Perú para esta fiesta que se extiende por tres días. 

Santos durante todo el año se dedica a la agricultura y crianza de animales menores pues tiene varios terrenos de cultivos y varios ganados como vacas, ovejas, gallinas y cuyes, él es uno de los fundadores del banco comunal “Nuevo Amanecer” y tiene varios años participando. En esta ciudad no existe entidad financieras permanentes como la Asociación Arariwa entonces él se presta dinero desde hace varios años atrás entonces en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para compra animales menores como cuyes. Santos está agradecido por el apoyo brindado y se compromete a pagar con mucha responsabilidad y puntualidad las cuotas.
texts.en:
Santos was born in the city of Paucartambo.  This city is known for having beautiful landscapes and for being the most “folk” city in the Cusco department.  Most of the residents raise livestock and farm.  The Virgin [Mary] of Carmen festival is celebrated in July and people come from different parts of Peru for this three-day festival.

Santos farms and raises small animals year round and has several farm plots and livestock, including cows, sheep, chickens, and Guinea pigs.  He is one of the founders of the “Nuevo Amanecer” communal bank and has been involved for some years.  There are no permanent financial entities in this town, such as Asociación Arariwa, but he has been borrowing money for several years.  He needs this loan to buy small animals such as Guinea pigs.  Santos is grateful for the support and is committed to being responsible and on time with his payments.

loans.use: to buy Guinea pigs.

loans.name: José Raúl

texts.es:
José de 22 años de edad,  estudio hasta séptimo  grado de nivel académico,  está acompañado  la esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, han procreado 1 hijo en este matrimonio y solamente él vive con su  hijo.

José se dedica a la agricultura desde que tenía 10  años de edad,  este trabajo se lo enseño el Papá  ya que él quería que aprendiera este oficio y se los enseño para  que en un futuro se pudieran defender, el trabajo le queda a una distancia de 20 minutos  y él viaja a pie, su horario de trabajo es de 6 de la mañana hasta las 11am.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para pagar el alquilar del terreno en donde cultiva la milpa, esto le va mejor mucho ya que con tiempo se está preparando el terreno para los cultivos esperando la ayuda en Dios que sea muy bueno este invierno y poder sacar mucha cosecha y así se obtendrá más ganancias, ya que una parte de cultivo se vende y lo demás se deja para el consumo familiar.

Los sueños que tiene es que siempre Dios le preste vida para seguir cultivando la tierra y tener como llevar el sostén de la casa, ya que este fruto esta cosecha que ahorita posee es con el sudor de su frente y es así como quiero seguir para sacar adelante a su hijo.
texts.en:
José is 22 years old. He studied until the seventh grade. She is accompanied by his wife who works in domestic tasks. They have one son through this marriage and he only lives with his son. 

José has worked in agriculture since he was 10 years old. He learned this work from his father who wanted him to learn this profession. He taught them so that they could support themselves in the future. His work is located 20 minutes away and he travels there on food. His work schedule is from six in the morning until eleven in the morning. 

The loan he is applying for with CrediCampo is to pay rent on the land where he grows corn. This will help him a lot since he is busy preparing the land for the crops. He hopes that God's help will be very good this winter so he can have a good harvest and make more profits. One part of the crops is sold and the other part is saved for consumption in the home. 

His dreams are always that God gives him life to continue harvesting the land and to be able to maintain his home. Since the fruits of this harvest he has now is with the sweat of his brow and that is how he wants to raise his son.

loans.use: to pay rent on the land where he grows corn.

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
El socio Rene se dedica al negocio de servicio de taxi,el socio hace servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles de la ciudad,el socio trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es comprarse un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar llantas para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member, Rene, is engaged in the taxi service business. He provides taxi service on various streets of the city, working from 8:00 a.m. until 10:00 p.m. The member has been engaged in this business for several years now, and it is going very well.  His dream is to purchase a new car.  

He is requesting the loan in order to purchase tires for his car. The member is happy about the loan, and he is committed to making his payments.

loans.use: to purchase tires for his car.

loans.name: Ruel

texts.en:
Ruel is a merchant from Guidulman, Bohol. He runs a sari-sari or variety store business as well as a videoke/karaoke service. This has been his source of income for more than 2 years.

Ruel asks for a loan to buy canned goods, noodles, soap, toiletries, soda and beverages. He will be able to improve his stocks thus allowing him to sell more.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, noodles, soap, toiletries, soda and beverages

loans.name: Tâm

texts.en:
Tâm operates a fishing  business.  She is 47 years old and  married with 2 children.
She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tâm's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
