Ella posee una pequeña tienda  donde vende todo tipo de productos, últimamente se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con productos de excelente calidad a precios realmente accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Carmelina  es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere hacer crecer su negocio es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, embutidos, golosinas, bebidas etc. ella tiene la confianza que con su dedicación podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Carmelina is 51 years old. She lives in her own house with her family. She has a little store where she sells all types of products. Recently she has had many customers, because she always has what people need, with products of excellent quality at really affordable prices and with unequaled service. Carmelina is an entrepreneurial woman with a great will to advance. She wants to make her business grow, and it is for this reason that she is applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, cold meats, candies, beverages, etc. She has confidence that with her dedication she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, cold meats, candies, beverages, etc.

loans.name: Carmen Mercedes

texts.es:
Hace 29 años inicia esta historia, de una niña llamada Carmen Mercedes  la cual tiene 5 hermanos con ella son 6 la familia está  conformada por mamá, papá 4 hermanas 1 hermano, la niñez y adolescencia fueron muy bonitas, solo que al cumplir 16 años conoció al que iba a ser el esposo, todo fue muy bonito al iniciar la relación, Pero al pasar el tiempo el conoció a muchas mujeres y más de una vez  la engaño y le hizo daño, de esta relación de 13 años quedaron tres hermosos hijos dos niños 1 niña, los cuales son el motor de esta mujer que lo único que quiere es sacar los hijos adelante ya que después de 13 años  de estos 6 de casada se entera que le estaba siendo infiel con la que iba a ser la madrina del último hijo. 
Esto fue en el año 2011, al enterarse lo saca de la casa, queda sola con los tres hijos, sin trabajo y mercado ya que él no lo hacía, los padres estaban muy pendientes de ella y los niños, la hermana mayor  se entera que hay un nuevo curso  en el barrio y así que inicia este estudio para que salga de ese encierro, ella lo acepta, ya que es cerca y se ahorra lo de los buces, es un curso de modistería allí ella aprende a manejar maquina plana, y es la salida de tanto dolor, angustia e impotencia por haber perdido a el esposo y padre de los hijos, así ella en este curso  encuentra muchas amistades  que la hacen olvidar  la realidad, pero  hay una mujer  en especial, la cual le ayuda a conseguir trabajo en un hospital como aseadora, de allí ella sale a ejercer un nuevo trabajo y es el de guarda de seguridad. 
La vida cambia, ya que puede suplir las obligaciones del hogar, ella sigue ahorrando para algún día tener la casa propia, pues ella ahorraba desde que estaba con el papa de los hijos, pero el nunca se entero, ella lo único que quiere es que los hijos sean unos profesionales, por esto es que ella busca alternativas de estudio y se entera de la institución de campo alto Por unos estudiantes del mismo instituto que van a realizar prácticas en el hospital donde ella trabaja. Una de las profesora le da los datos y es cuando ella decide matricularse y alcanzar uno de los sueños que no había hecho realidad por estar cerca a el esposo y dedicarse al hogar, pero al pasar todo esto ella toma una buena decisión y es empezar a vivir,  pues el tiempo perdido ya no se puede recuperar, y así estudia para demostrar  que no hay cosas imposibles si no seres incapaces. . 
Por el momento ella solo está cumpliendo uno de los sueños, que es estudiar lo que ella siempre ha querido, Auxiliar De Enfermería, en octubre del 2013 se matriculo y el anhelo más grande es graduarse y así poder ejercer lo que toda la vida ha anhelado, servirle a la gente más necesitada en el área de la salud ,y ejercerlo con profesionalismo, aprender y demostrarle a todo el mundo incluyendo a el ex esposo que todo lo que  uno sueña y sufre obteniéndolo vale la pena y también para que los hijos se den cuenta que no hay nada imposible a pesar de las circunstancias. 
Ella necesitaría del convenio con kiva, ya que los gastos que ella tiene sola son bastantes, ademas de los gastos que le generan los tres hijos, es un poco complicado para ella poder pagar el valor total de las cuotas, con el subsidio que le puede dar kiva ella se puede economizar una parte del dinero que paga y ese dinero utilizarlo en los gastos que ella tenga o los hijos.
texts.en:
This story begins 29 years ago when a little girl named Carmen Mercedes was born. Her family consisted of a mother, a father, four sisters, a brother, and herself, and she had a happy childhood and adolescence. When she was just 16 years old, she met the boy who would become her husband, and in the beginning, everything was beautiful. But as time went on, he got to know many women, and more than once he deceived Carmen and hurt her. From this 13-year relationship, they had three lovely children: two boys and a girl, who are the engine behind everything that drives Carmen. All that she wants is to get her children ahead. After 13 years together and 6 years of marriage, Carmen learned her husband had been unfaithful to her with the woman who was to be the godmother of their youngest child.

This was in 2011. When she kicked him out, she was left alone with three children, without work or income, now that he was gone. Her parents were watching out for her and the children, though, and her oldest sister learned about a new class in the neighborhood, which Carmen took as a way out of her isolation since it was nearby and she was able to save on bus fare. The class was about sewing, and she learned to run a flat sewing machine. It was her way out of all the pain, anguish, and helplessness that her husband and the father of her children had left behind him. In her class, she made a lot of friends who helped her to forget her reality. One special woman in particular helped her get a job in a hospital as a custodian. From there she was able to get a new job as a security guard.

Life changed and she was able to meet her household obligations. She continued to save so that she could one day buy her own home, as she had been saving throughout her marriage (unknown to him). But her chief goal has always been to see her children become professionals, and to make that happen, she began looking for other options for schooling. She found out about CampoAlto through some students who worked at the hospital where she did. One of the professors gave her some information and she decided to enroll and reach out for one of the dreams she had never been able to achieve while she was keeping house for her husband. She made a sound decision: the decision to begin to live. Lost time can never be recovered, but she started school to show that there are no impossible things nor incapable people.

For now, she is achieving one of her dreams, that of studying for what she has always wanted to become, a nurse's aid. In October 2013 she enrolled, and her greatest desire is to graduate and serve the most needed people in the health field, doing so with professionalism. She will learn and show the entire world, including her ex-husband, that a person's dreams and what it takes to achieve them are worth the effort. She also hopes that her children will realize that nothing is impossible, regardless of circumstances.

She needs Kiva's collective help, since her expenses are considerable, not just for tuition but also those that her three children generate. It's a little complicated for her to pay all of her bills, but with the loan from Kiva, she can save part of her money and use it towards her or her childrens' expenses.

loans.use: pay a semester of tuition toward becoming a nurse's aid

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta de 22 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a sus padres y su grupo familiar, desde hace 4 años se dedica a la venta de pescado lo hace de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en su casa con los gastos, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pescado por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así seguir ayudando a su familia para que puedan tener junto con ella una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: The customer is 22 years old, and she lives in her own home with her parents and family. Four years ago, she started in the business of selling fish by foot through the different neighborhoods near her home. With what she earns from her sales, she helps with the household expenses. The customer is requesting a loan so that she can buy fish at the wholesale market which will let her continue with her job, her only source of income. That way she can continue helping her family so that together, they will have a higher quality of life.

loans.use: buy fish at wholesale rates.

loans.name: Gladys De Los Angeles

texts.es: Gladys  vive con su compañero de vida y sus dos  hijos en casa propia. Ella posee una tortillería en su residencia, ya tiene muchos años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues tiene un excelente servicio, es muy amable con las personas que la visitan, además tiene gran agilidad para la elaboración de las mismas y atiende a los clientes en poco tiempo. Gladys  es muy dedicada en su trabajo para ella las batallas más importantes de la vida son las que peleamos diariamente para alcanzar nuestros sueños y ella está dispuesta a esforzarse por su objetivo es por eso que le solicita a ITNEGRAL  un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor para seguir produciendo. Ella tiene la esperanza que de esta forma le dará a su familia una seguridad económica en el hogar.
texts.en: Gladys lives with her partner and their two children in their own home. She has a tortilla making business in her home. She has many years of experience in the business, and she has earned a large clientele, thanks to her excellent service and her friendly attitude toward people who come and visit. She's also quick and precise in making her tortillas, and is able to attend to her customers in no time at all. Gladys is very devoted to her work. To her, the most important battles in life are the ones we fight every day to reach our dreams. She's the kind of person who drives herself to reach her dreams, and that's why she is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL. It will let her buy corn on the wholesale market so she can keep making her tortillas. She hopes that through her work, she will be able to give her family the gift of economic security.

loans.use: purchase corn at wholesale

loans.name: Jose Inocente

texts.es: Jose, tiene 27 años de edad, esta casado, tiene dos hijos y reside en una aldea de Yamaranguila, Intibucá.  Siempre ha trabajado en la agricultura, cultiva papas, maíz, frijoles, brócoli, coliflor y remolacha. Dicha producción es vendida en los mercados locales de la zona. Ha solicitado el cuarto ciclo de préstamo que es por 10,000 lempiras con el cual va comprar semilla de papa, abono, cal, fertilizantes, insecticidas y otros insumos para la siembra y asistencia a los cultivos. Su plan es mejorar sus ingresos mediante las siembras constantes.
texts.en: Jose is 27 years old. He is married, has two children, and lives in a village in Yamaranguila, Intibucá. He has always worked in agriculture, raising potatoes, corn, beans, broccoli, cauliflower, and beets. He then sells his produce in various local markets. He is requesting his fourth loan, in the amount of 10,000 lempiras, which he will use to buy seed potatoes, fertilizer, lime, manure, insecticides, and other supplies for planting and helping his crops along. His plan is to increase his income through constant cultivation.

loans.use: buy supplies to plant and grow his crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hair accessories, earrings, chains and bracelets of good quality, sandals.

loans.name: Djekafo 1 Group

texts.fr:
DJEKAFO 1 est un groupe de l’association BINBAGALAWILI. Il regroupe des femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 38 ans. Mariées avec moyenne quatre enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments à l’image de MARIAM qui est la première personne assise de la droite vers la gauche  de la photo. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à  SELINGUE (Région de Sikasso, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités d’achat vente de condiments: tomates, oignons et choux. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leur clientèle, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur deuxième prêt solidaire.
MARIAM, excelle dans la vente de condiments. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 5 sacs d’oignon et 5 paniers de tomate.  Elle s’approvisionne à SELINGUE et sur place auprès des grossistes  et vend ses condiments à SELINGUE, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 40.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité d’achat vente de condiments.
texts.en:
DJEKAFO 1 is a group of the association BINBAGALAWILI. It is composed of women who know one another through ties of kinship and community. The women average 38 years of age. Married with an average of four children, they run different businesses, such as the buying and selling of condiments, as does MARIAM, who is the first persons sitting from the right in the photo. The women live in large traditional families in SELINGUE, Région de Sikasso (Republic of Mali). The women have been in small-scale commerce for several years and are much in demand in their businesses buying and selling condiments: tomatoes, onions, and cabbage.

Concerned about satisfying the growing needs of their customer, the group members decided to joint the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are now on their second solidarity loan. 

MARIAM excels in selling condiments. She intends to use her loan to purchase 5 sacks of onions and 5 baskets of tomatoes. She gets her supplies locally from wholesalers and sells her condiments retail to men and women customers paying with cash or credit in SELINGUE. She is hoping for a monthly profit of 40,000 francs CFA that will enable her to pay back the loan and to reinvest in her business buying and selling condiments

loans.use: to purchase condiments, such as onions and tomatoes

loans.name: Cupertino

texts.es:
Don Cupertino estudio cuarto grado, esta casado y es padre de cinco hijos su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar. Don Cupertino se dedica a la agricultura, él es un hombre que le encanta trabajar la tierra en el invierno se dedica a la siembras de maíz, frijoles y maicillo de la cual obtiene muchos ingresos ya sea para el sustento de la familia o para la venta de granos basicos y en la temporada del verano se dedica a fabricar la teja elaborada a base de barro.

Con la ayuda del credito estara comprando materiales para la fabricacion de teja como: sacate, barro y otros. 
El sueño mas grande de don Cupertino es dar a sus hijos el estudio universitario, para verlos convertidos en unos profecioneales y que ellos puedan gozar de una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Don Cupertino went to school through fourth grade. He is married and is the father of five children. His wife takes care of the household tasks. Don Cupertino works in agriculture. He is a man who loves to work the land. In the winter, he works in his plantings of corn, beans, and sorghum, from which he obtains a lot of income, whether for the sustenance of the family or for the sale of basic grains, and in the summer he makes tiles from clay.

With the help of the loan, he will be buying materials to make tiles, such as grass, clay, and other materials.

The greatest dream of Don Cupertino is to give his children a university education, to see them become professionals so that they can enjoy a better life.

loans.use: to buy grass, clay, and other materials to make tiles.

loans.name: Floridalma

texts.es: Floridalma, tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera, vive en el municipio de San Antonio, departamento de Suchitepéquez, se dedica a la venta de regalos, ropa y cosméticos el local lo tiene instalado en su casa, de esta actividad obtiene sus ingresos, además se dedica a planchar ropa con sus vecinos, el negocio lo inició hace 5 años, Floridalma solicita Q. 8,500.00 para comprar más productos y tener más variedad, el sueño de ella en el futuro es  que su negocio este más grande y surtido para atender mejor a sus clientes
texts.en: Floridalma, 28 years old, is single and lives in the town of San Antonio, in the Suchitepéquez department. She is in the business of selling gifts, clothing, and cosmetics out of a home-based store. She earns money from this business and also from ironing clothing that she takes in from her neighbors, a line of work she started five years ago. Floridalma is asking for Q.8,500.00 to buy more products and offer her customers greater variety. Her dream for the future is that she might have a larger, better stocked business so that she can meet her customers' needs better.

loans.use: purchase cosmetics for resale

loans.name: Danayaso Group

texts.fr:
DANAYASO est un groupe de l’association JIGUIYA de KANGARE. Il regroupe des femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 28 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne trois enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de céréales à l’image de MASSIGA  qui est la première personne debout de la  gauche vers la droite  de la photo. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à KANGARE  Région de Sikasso, République du Mali. 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités d’achat vente de céréales : riz, maïs et mil. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leur clientèle, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso. Elles sont à leur troisième prêt solidaire. 
MASSIGA, qui est un membre du groupe et très connue à KANGARE, excelle dans la vente de céréales. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 3 sacs de riz.  Elle s’approvisionne à SELINGUE et sur place,  et vend ses céréales à KANGARE, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 30.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et être réinvestir dans son activité d’achat vente de céréales.
texts.en:
DANAYASO is a group of the association JIGUIYA de KANGARE. It is composed of women who know one another through ties of kinship and community. The women average 28 years of age. Married with an average of three children, they run different businesses, such as the buying and selling of grains, as does MASSIGA, who is the first persons standing from the left in the photo. The women live in large traditional families in KANGARE, Région de Sikasso (Republic of Mali). The women have been in small-scale commerce for several years and are much in demand in their businesses buying and selling grains: rice, corn, and millet.

Concerned about satisfying the growing needs of their customers, the group members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program. They are now on their third solidarity loan. 

MASSIGA, who is a member of the group and well-known in KANGARE, excels in selling grains. She intends to use her loan to purchase 3 sacks of rice. She gets her supplies locally and sells her grains retail to men and women customers paying with cash or credit in KANGARE. She is hoping for a monthly profit of 30,000 francs CFA that will enable her to pay back the loan and to reinvest in her business buying and selling grains.

loans.use: to purchase grains, such as rice

loans.name: Dolores Del Carmen

texts.es: Dolores de 35 años de edad se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos de uso personal como lociones, desodorantes, perfumes, cremas para el cabello y el cuerpo, shampoo, entre otras cosas, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia pero también vende de forma ambulante por las diferentes colonias que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos de su hogar,  vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus hijos, la clienta desea acrecentar su negocio por eso solicita un crédito que le permita poder comprar más mercadería  por mayor ya que tiene mucha clientela por dar sus productos a precios accesibles con la ayuda solicitada ella podrá obtener mejores ganancias y así seguirá dándole a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Dolores, 35 years old, is in the business of selling all kinds of personal care products, such as lotion, deodorant, perfume, hair and body creams, shampoo, and many other things. Her business is based out of her home, but she also sells from a cart through the various neighborhoods near her house. Between her income from her sales and her husband's earnings, they manage to meet the household expenses. They live in their own home along with their children.  Dolores wants to grow her business, and that's why she's asking for this loan, which will let her buy more merchandise on the wholesale market. She has a lot of customers who want to buy her products thanks to her accessible prices. With a little help, she will be able to earn greater income and continue to provide her family with whatever they need.

loans.use: buy cosmetic and personal care supplies for resale

loans.name: Jiguiya Group

texts.fr:
YELEN est un groupe de l’association JIGUIYA de CARRIERE. Il regroupe des femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 25 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne un enfant, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments à l’image de DJENEBOU qui est la première personne debout de la gauche vers la droite  de la photo. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles dans la Sous-préfecture de SELINGUE (Région de Sikasso, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités d’achat vente de condiments : poivres, tomates et  oignons.
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leurs clientèles, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso, il y a dix ans. Elles sont à leur onzième prêt solidaire. 
DJENEBOU, qui est la présidente du groupe et très connue à CARRIERE, excelle dans la vente de condiments. Elle compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 10 paniers de tomate et 5 sacs d’oignon.  Elle s’approvisionne à SELINGUE et sur place auprès des grossistes  et vend ses articles à SELINGUE, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle mixte.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 80.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et être réinvestir dans son activité d’achat vente de condiments.
texts.en:
YELEN is a group of the association JIGUIYA de CARRIERE. It is composed of women who know one another through ties of kinship and community. The women average 25 years of age. Married with an average of one child, they run different businesses, such as the buying and selling of grains, as does DJENEBOU, who is the first persons standing from the left in the photo. The women live in large traditional families in Sub-préfecture de SELINGUE, Région de Sikasso (Republic of Mali). The women have been in small-scale commerce for several years and are much in demand in their businesses buying and selling condiments: black pepper, tomatoes, and onions.

Concerned about satisfying the growing needs of their customers, the group members decided to join the Soro Yiriwaso loan program ten years ago. They are now on their eleventh solidarity loan. 

DJENEBOU, who is the group's president and well-known in CARRIERE, excels in selling condiments. She intends to use her loan to purchase 5 sacks of onions. She gets her supplies locally from wholesalers and sells her goods retail to a mixed customer base paying with cash or credit in SELINGUE. She is hoping for a monthly profit of 80,000 francs CFA that will enable her to pay back the loan and to reinvest in her business buying and selling condiments.

loans.use: to purchase condiments, such as tomatoes and onions

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, onions, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Leovegilda

texts.en: Leovegilda is married and the mother of four grown up children. Leovegilda runs a sari-sari, or variety store, business, selling various goods and items to the people in her area. She also operates a welding and motor repair shop with her husband. Leovegilda is asking for a loan to buy materials such as steel bars, screw drivers and additional groceries such as canned goods, candies, soda, beverages, biscuits and snack foods. With this, she will be able to improve her business and augment her income.

loans.use: to buy materials such as steel bars, screw drivers and groceries

loans.name: Dora Aminta

texts.es: Dora de 53 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su familia, ella es una mujer emprendedora y luchadora. Hace algunos años se decidió poner un pequeño negocio en cual consiste en una pequeña tienda que con gran esfuerzo y dedicación ha logrado mantener a lo largo de varios años. Cuenta con mucha clientela ya que para Dora lo más importante son los clientes, siempre los atiende con una sonrisa y mucha amabilidad, razón por la cual se ha ganado la confianza de muchos en la zona y a demás porque siempre tiene lo que los clientes buscan. El negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación. Ha decidido invertir en su negocio en la compra de artículos de tienda al por mayor, con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le permitan mejorar sus niveles de ventas e ingresos. Es por esta razón que se motivo en solicitar este crédito a INTEGRLAL para poder abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: arroz, frijoles, azúcar, leche, café, golosinas, aceite, papel, detergente, y de más productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera logrará cumplir su sueño de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia.
texts.en:
Dora, 53 years old, lives in a house along with her family. She is a hard-working, enterprising woman. Several years ago she decided to open a small shop, and with hard work and dedication, she has managed to keep it open through the years. She relies on a large customer base; for Dora, customers are the most important thing. She serves everyone with a smile and friendliness, which, along with the fact that she always has what people are looking for, is why so many people in the area have come to trust her.
Her business is based out of her home. She has decided to invest in her business by buying various products on the wholesale market with the goal of attracting more customers, which will let her increase both her sales and her income. That's why she came to INTEGRAL, so that she can stock her store with all kinds of products, including rice, beans, sugar, milk, coffee, snacks, oil, paper, detergents, and more. She is confident that in this way, she will be able to meet her goals of improving her and her family's living conditions.

loans.use: stock her grocery store

loans.name: Ligia Aurelia

texts.es:
Ligia Aurelia habita en el municipio de El Sauce, tiene la edad de 47 años, madre soltera de tres hijos uno de ellos estudiando en la universidad.
Es una mujer muy fuerte, luchadora y trabajadora merecedora de admiración ya que desde muy joven quedó viuda y le tocó criar sola a sus hijos teniendo que ir a trabajar hacia Costa Rica para poder mantenerlos, fue ahí donde adquirió experiencia en elaboración de comida y optó por poner su propio negocio hace 25 años en su casa de habitación el que ha ido mejorando conforme los años.
Este negocio es llamado cafetín La Marca y en él ofrece variedad de comida corriente y a la carta, también refrescos. Trabaja en conjunto con uno de sus hijos el que le apoya sobre todo los fines de semana cuando regresa de clases.
Ligia está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos para la comida, gaseosas, jugos y golosinas con el fin de brindar variedad de comida a sus clientes y así variar el menú.
Solicita a los inversionistas de Kiva para que a través de Ceprodel le apoyen con este préstamo para poder llevar a cabo su inversión.
texts.en:
Ligia Aurelia lives in the town of El Sauce. She is 47 years old and a single mother of three children, one of whom is studying at the university. She is a very strong, determined and hardworking woman who deserves admiration since she was widowed very young and had to raise her children alone. She had to go to work in Costa Rica in order to be able to support them. It was there that she acquired experience in food preparation and then she decided to start her own business 25 years ago in her home. Over the years, she has gradually improved her business.

Her business is called La Marca Cafe and she offers a variety of dishes and food a la carte, as well as drinks. She works with one of her sons who helps out principally on weekends, when he returns from classes.

Ligia is requesting a loan to purchase supplies for her meals, soft drinks, juice and sweets, with the goal of providing a number of different dishes to her customers and thus adding variety to the menu.

She requests that Kiva lenders help her with this loan through Ceprodel so that she can make this investment.

loans.use:
to purchase supplies for meals, soft drinks,
juice and sweets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fashionable slippers for her business,

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es: Soledad es una persona de 21 años de edad, vive con su familia en el municipio de San Pablo Jocopilas, departamento de Suchitepéquez, tiene dos hijos de 4 años y de un año y medio,  todavía no asisten a la escuela, ella se dedica a vender comida en forma ambulante en la comunidad, tienen 8 años de experiencia, es un negocio muy rentable, Soledad solicita un crédito a ADICLA por la cantidad de Q. 10,000.00 para invertirlo en la venta de comida y con ello generar más ganancia y con las ganancias contribuir en los gastos de la familia. Los planes de Soledad es tener un local fijo donde atender mejor y en forma adecuada a sus clientes.
texts.en: Soledad, age 21, lives with her family in the town of San Pablo Jocopilas, in the Suchitepéquez department. She has two children who aren't yet old enough for school, ages four and a year and a half. Soledad's business is selling food from a cart in her community. She's been doing it for 8 years, and it's been very profitable for her. Soledad is requesting this loan from ADICLA in the amount of 10,000.00 to invest in buying food. With this, she will generate greater income, and her income will contribute towards the expenses of the family. Soledad plans to have a fixed location one day where she can better serve her customers.

loans.use: purchase food for her food cart

loans.name: Ma. Fe

texts.en: Ma. Fe earns a living through her retail sales of processed meat to the people in her area. She is married and the mother of four children. Ma. Fe is asking for a loan to buy more processed meats such as chorizo, hotdogs, ham, etc. With this, she will be able to improve her stock, thus allowing her to sell more to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more processed meats such as chorizo, hotdogs, ham, etc.

loans.name: Dorita

texts.es: Dorita de 36 años de edad vive en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar, desde hace varios años se dedica a la venta de pescado su negocio lo tiene ubicado en el mercado que se encuentra cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos que se le presentan en su lugar de residencia, la clienta está solicitando un crédito para la compra de pescado por mayor para poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y así tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Dorita, 36 years old, lives in her own home with her family. For several years now, she has been in the business of selling fish at a market located close to her home. The earnings she makes from this work let her meet her household expenses. Dorita is requesting a loan to buy fish on the wholesale market so that she can continue in her work, which is her only source of income, and thus provide her family with greater quality of life.

loans.use: buy fish at wholesale prices

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn is a fish vendor from Guindulman, Bohol. She is married and the mother of three children. Marilyn is asking for a loan to buy more fish to sell. With this, she will be able to sell more, thus augmenting her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more frozen fish and chicken for her business

loans.name: Shkelqim

texts.en:
Shkelqim, whose name means “shiny” in English, wants to make some repairs to their family home. He is 34 and has two children, 8 and 6 years old. He is photographed inside the stable.

Shkelqim’s main activity is agriculture / livestock; yet he works as a concierge / security guard in a nearby hotel. His family lives in a little village, covered in green, not far from the city of Elbasan. These last ten years, the city and the village have expanded; hence, the village is now considered suburbia. Living in suburbia makes it easier for villagers to bring their fresh produce to the farmers’ market in the city.

loans.use: to make basic repairs to their family home

loans.name: Leslíe Catarina

texts.es: Leslíe es una persona de 23 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Santo Tomás La Unión, Suchitepéquez, tiene una hija de dos años de edad todavía no asiste a la escuela, se dedica a vender ropa típica y lo hace de forma ambulante, ella se ha dado cuenta que es un negocio muy rentable, empezó a negociar hace un año, y con las ganancias que ella obtiene ayuda a su esposo a cubrir los gastos de la familia, además imparte clases por las tardes a personas adultas que no saben leer y escribir, ella tiene un gran espíritu de colaboración a ella le gustaría que todas las personas sepan leer y escribir, en el futuro Leslie quiere tener un local en el mercado del municipio para tener mejor opción a vender y con ello mejorar sus ganancias
texts.en:
Leslíe, age 23, lives in the Santo Tomás La Unión municipality in Suchitepéquez.  She has a two year old daughter who does not yet go to school.  Leslíe sells typical clothing in an itinerant manner.  She realized that it is a very profitable business.  She started her business a year ago.  She helps her husband cover the family expenses with the profits that she gets.  

Also, in the afternoons she teaches classes for adults who do not know how to read and write.  She has a great spirit for helping others.  She would like for everyone to know how to read and write.  

In the future Leslíe wants to have a place at the municipal market.  She wants to do this in order to have a better opportunity for sales.  With this she will improve her earnings.

loans.use: to sell typical clothing.

loans.name: Henry Noel

texts.es: Henry de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica  a la venta de todo tipo de dulces como: chicles, bombones, paletas,  etc.  los distribuye por las diferentes tienda que se encuentran en su municipio ya tiene mucha clientela establecida por los buenos precios y la calidad de los productos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de us hogar, Henry está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas mercadería por mayor para seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos  y así poder tener junto con su compañera de vida una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Henry, age 34, lives in his own home with his partner. He is in the business of selling all kinds of candies, including gum, chocolates, lollipops, and other sweets. He distributes them to various stores in town, and he has established a large customer base thanks to his good prices and the high quality of his products. With what he earns, he is able to cover his various household expenses. Henry is requesting his loan to buy more merchandise at wholesale so that he can continue with his work, which is his only source of income, and provide him and his partner with a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy sweets, candies, snacks, and more at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a Sistema Biobolsa biodigester and biogas stove

loans.name: Tomás

texts.es: Tomás, es una persona de 46 años de edad, vive con su familia en el municipio de Santa Catarina Ixtahuacán, departamento de Sololá, tiene 2 hijos de: 5 y 3 años todavía no asiste a la escuela, Tomás sale a trabajar por días con dueños de otros terrenos para limpiar y cosechar, él tiene cultivado banano y café  de allí también obtiene sus ingresos para mantener a su familia, él solicita a ADICLA  Q. 5,000.00 para comprar un lote de terreno, el sueño de Tomas es tener su casa en mejores condiciones y apoyar a sus hijos para que ellos estudien y que tenga mejores oportunidades.
texts.en: Tomás, age 46, lives with his family in the town of Santa Catarina Ixtahuacán, in the Sololá department. He has two children, ages 3 and 5, who aren't in school yet. Tomás goes out and does day labor for various land owners, cleaning and harvesting. He also has banana and coffee crops, and from these he earns enough income to provide for his family. He is requesting a loan for Q. 5,000.00 from ADICLA which he will use to buy a parcel of land. Tomás' dream is to improve his home and support his children so that they can go to school and have greater opportunity.

loans.use: buy a parcel of land to plant

loans.name: Jeoridia

texts.en: Jeoridia,  48 years old, is married and has 9 children. She lives in Patawag, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. Jeoridia is a farmer, planting corn and vegetables on her farm, which she has had for 38 years. Each month, she earns approximately 3,000 PHP. Jeoridia is a new member of PMPC and she has applied for a loan to purchase fertilizers. In the future, Jeoridia hopes to expand her farm.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her farm

loans.name: Sar's Group

texts.en:
Originally from the Moung Russey district of Battambang province, Cambodia, Sar is a 49-year-old married mother of three children. Her family's main source of income is rice farming. She has been in this business for 20 years and is able to earn about 66,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Sar’s group consists of two female members and this is her fourth microloan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. As the leader, Sar will use her portion of this loan to buy manure and rice seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her business income and improve her lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy manure and rice seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Mao's Group

texts.en:
Mao, 48, is widowed and lives with three children in a village of the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She has been farming rice for 24 years, earning about 28,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Mao has been with VisionFund for five loan cycles, and she has successfully paid back the past loans, which have helped her family relieve financial burdens and improve their livelihood. 

Now requesting another loan with VisionFund, Mao, who is the leader, will use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. With this loan, she hopes to increase her crop yields and earn more income to better her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Nhor

texts.en:
Nhor, 43, is married with seven children residing in a rural village of the Kampong Cham district of Kampong Cham province. To support the family, she and her husband have been working as construction workers. The current business earns her about 70,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day to support her family.

Nhor has been with VisionFund for four loan cycles and successfully used the loans to better support her family. She is now applying for a loan to renovate her old house. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to renovate her old house

location.town: Kampong Cham Province, Kampong Cham District

loans.name: Liz  Wendy

texts.es:
Ella es  Liz Wendy, actualmente se dedica  a trabajar  como asesora  de  cobranzas.
Alguna de las  fortalezas  como persona, es  muy  dedicada  a todo  lo que  hace con el  hogar, a el esposo, a los hijos, a  el  trabajo, es  una persona  con  iniciativa  propia, segura de  si  misma, es  algo perfeccionista y  con  una  buenas  bases  de  amor y seguridad  que se  enseñaron  los padres. 

Las  personas que han  influido  en la vida   cotidiana  son  la familia, la cual esta integrada  por   la madre  maria, el padre   Hernan, el  hermano Geferson, el esposo  Fabio,  los tres  hijos Sharon, David y Samuel, los cuales  siempre  la han   apoyado  en  las  decisiones   y en  los problemas  que  le  han surgido. 
En cuanto   a   los  intereses desde  temprana  edad  quiso  estudiar   y gracias  a Dios  y  por  el  apoyo del  esposo   hoy  puede   lograr   este   sueño   de empezar  a estudiar. 

Solo  le pido Dios  que  esta oportunidad  que se le presenta en estos  momentos  de estudiar la pueda  concluir, ya que quiere  ser  un  ejemplo  para  los hijos y ofrecerles  la oportunidad de que  el día  de  mañana   tengan un mejor   proyecto  de la vida, ya que ella se  ve proyectada en un corto tiempo, poder ascender  en donde  labora  para mejorar  los ingresos, a  mediano   tiempo  culminar  los  estudios  y a un  largo   tiempo  con  un mejor  empleo  y   la  casa  que  siempre  ha deseado para   los hijos. 

En este momento ella solicita del convenio con kica, ya que para ella es una ayuda grand el momento de realizar el pago de las cuotas mensuales que debe cancelar, el dinero es un factor importante para cualquier persona y en este caso a ella le serviría mucho tener ese ahorro al momento de hacer el pato de las cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
This is Liz Wendy, who is studying to become a collections consultant.  She has many personal strengths: she is dedicated to everything in her life - her home, her husband, her children, her job; she is self-motivated, sure of herself, something of a perfectionist, and she can count on a base of love and security from her parents.

The people who have most influenced her life are her family: her mother, Maria; her father, Hernan; her brother, Geferson; her husband, Fabio; her three children, Sharon, David, and Samuel. All of these people have supported her in her decisions and in the problems that have arisen. In light of her interests from an early age, she wanted to go to school, and thanks to God and with the support of her husband, she is achieving that dream today.

She only asks God that she is able to complete this opportunity that has presented itself to her, since she wants to set a good example for her children and provide them the opportunity to make tomorrow better than today. In the short term, she expects to work her way up in her job, earning more money, and in the medium term, she hopes to graduate. In the long term, she will look for a better job and a better home, the kind of which she has always wanted for her children.

At this time, she is requesting help from Kiva. This is a big help for her, at this time when the monthly payments come due. Money is important to anyone, and in this case, it would help her so much if she could keep some money left over after paying her tuition.

loans.use: pay a semester of tuition

loans.name: Tueng

texts.en:
Toerng, 25, is married with two children residing in a rural village located in the Siem Reap province’s Srey Snom district, Cambodia. She has two children. For the last seven years, she has been farming rice and growing cassava. The current business earns her about 35,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Toerng has been with VisionFund for one loan cycle and completely paid back the past loan. Now she is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Samont's Group

texts.en:
Samont, aged 48, is living in a rural village of the Moung Russey district. She has one child. She and her husband are rice farmers. She has been in this business for several years, earning about 40,000 KHR (Cambodian riels) per day. 

This is a microloan for Samont with VisionFund. Now she is leading her group to ask for a loan. As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland. She hopes to increase her income so as to make a better living.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and seeds for her farmland

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to enlarge her field of vegetables, buy animal fodder and pay tuition fees for her children

loans.name: Roun's Group

texts.en:
Roun, 50, is from a rural village located in the Moung Russey district of Battambang province. She is married and has five children. Roun and her husband earn a living through farming rice. Having been in this business for several years, Roun is able to earn about 40,000 KHR per day to meet the family’s needs.
 
Roun has been with VisionFund for seven cycles and has completely repaid her loans. She is now leading her group to ask for a loan. Roun is going to use her portion to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland. She hopes to make more income from her current business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides for her farmland

loans.name: Tuyên

texts.en:
Mrs. Tuyên has a service business shipping goods.

Tuyên is 26 years old and she is married with 2 children.
Tuyên lives with 2 dependents in a rural town in the Hoang Hoa district of Thanh Hoa province.

This is Tuyên's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women.  She has been involved in this business for 5 years.
The main hardship that Tuyên faces in her life is not having clean water and a hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to buy a water tank and clean water filter.

In the future, Tuyên hopes to build a new house, that her business does well, and that she can remodel her house.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and a clean water filter.

loans.name: Purita

texts.en: Purita is 27-years-old and single. Due to the lack of job opportunities, she decided to engage in a business to help her parents finance the education of her younger brother and sister. She has owned and managed a small snack house within the local community for almost five months. She aims to improve her business by offering more kinds of recipes to her customers, but she has insufficient capital. For this reason, she would like to request a loan amount of PHP 13,000 to buy snack foods, soft drinks, mineral water, spaghetti sauce, flour, bananas and other ingredients needed to cook and sell in her snack house. She is hoping that she will be granted her loan request s0 she will be able to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, soft drinks, mineral water, spaghetti sauce, flour, bananas and other ingredients

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to grow crops and help her husband to feed quails

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is 54-years-old, married and has two grown-up children. Her spouse is a laborer. She operates a retail store to gain income. She usually earns about PHP 5,000 each month. She wants to increase her sales capacity, but has insufficient funds to increase her merchandise. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy sardines, noodles, breads, biscuits and soap to sell. 

In the future, Juliet hopes to achieve good sales and profits for her family's welfare.

loans.use: to buy sardines, noodles, breads, biscuits and soap to sell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to invest in her ceramic shop

loans.name: Hoan

texts.en:
Hoan has a retail business selling dry food.

Hoan is 39 years old and is married with 3 children.  She lives with 3 dependents in Hoang Hoa district, in a rural town of Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hoan's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Hoan faces in her life is not having a water tank and water filter.  She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profits, Hoan hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hưu

texts.en:
Hưu operates a business fishing.

Hưu is 39 years old and married with 3 children.  She lives with 3 dependents in Hoang Hoa district, in a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hưu first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Hưu has been involved in this business for 9 years.
One of the most critical difficulties that concerns her is not having a clean water system and hygenic latrine.  She is requesting a loan to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

With her business profits, Hưu hopes to maintain a successful business, be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase sand, cement and brick to build a toilet.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en: To earn additional income, Rowena engages in a business buying and reselling jewelry within her community. She is 34-years-old and has three children who are in school. Due to the  high cost of commodities and school fees, she aims to strengthen her business to earn a sufficient income. She aims to acquire more jewelry to sell, but she does not have enough capital. For this reason, she is asking for a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy more bracelets, earrings, rings and many others to sell.  Being a hard working mother, she believes that she will be able to make her business more profitable.

loans.use: to buy more jewelry  to sell like bracelets, earrings, rings, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more chicks and animal fodder

loans.name: Minda

texts.en: Minda is 49, married and blessed with two children. To earn a living, she runs a small variety store within the local community. She aims to further improve the business and increase her income to help her husband in financing the education of their children.  Due to capital insufficiency, she is requesting a loan of PHP 9,000 to buy more stock of grocery items, frozen foods, fish, fruits and vegetables to sell. Through this loan, she is hoping that someday she will improve more of her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of grocery items, frozen foods, fish, fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en: Marilou is 46-years-old and blessed with two children who attend school. She and her husband aim to improve their status of living and educate their children. In this regard, she engages in a business buying and reselling soft drinks within her community. She supplies all the store owners within their village. She aims to acquire more stock of soft drinks to sell, but has limited capital. For this reason, she is asking for a loan amounting to PHP 9,000 to buy more stock of Coke, Sprite, Pop Cola, Pepsi, Royal, Mountain Dew and other kinds of soft drinks to sell. She believes that her loan will help her to further improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of Coke, Sprite, Pop Cola, Pepsi, Royal, Mountain Dew and other kinds of soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothing wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more chickens to resell and pay tuition fees for her children

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a heifer.

loans.name: Liên

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên operates a fishing business.

Liên is 38 years old and she is married with 2 children.  She lives with 2 dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Liên's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Liên faces in her life is not having a clean water system and a hygenic latrine.  She is requesting a loan to buy cement, brick, and sand to build a toilet.

With her business profits, Liên hopes to build a new house, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to buy cement, brick, and sand to build a toilet.

loans.name: Hiền

texts.en:
Mrs. Hiền works in agriculture farming.

Hiền is 21 years old and is married with 1 child.  She lives with 1 dependent in the Hoang Hoa district, in a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hiền's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women.  Hiền has been involved in this business for 4 years.
The main hardship that Hiền faces in her life is not having a clean water system or a hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to buy a water tank and a clean water filter.

Hiền hopes to maintain a successful business, be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and that her children find a good job.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and a clean water filter.

loans.name: Nam

texts.en:
Nam operates a fishing business.

Nam is 36 years old and is married with 2 children.  She lives with no dependents in Hoang Hoa district, in a rural town in the  Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nam's first loan with the Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women.  She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.
The main hardship that Nam faces in her life is not having a clean water system or hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to buy brick, cement, and sand to build a toilet.

In the future, Nam hopes that her children find a good job, that she is able to make enough money to provide for her kids, and that her business does well.

loans.use: to buy brick, cement, and sand to build a toilet.

loans.name: Domitila Antonia

texts.es:
Domitila  de 22 años de edad, estudio hasta 6° grado,  ella tiene dos hijos y esta soltera ya que el padre de los niños la  abandono,  de los niños solamente 1asiste a la escuela. 

 Domitila ha trabajado en la agricultura desde los 7 años,  ya que sus padres fueron agricultores. Desde que se acompañó inicio el cultivo por separado trabajando 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz junto al  padre de sus hijos;  ahora que ella está sola le corresponde velar por el cuidado y bienestar de sus hijos, ella sigue trabajando en la siembra de maíz, de lo que produce, dependen sus ingresos y con ellos, mantener a sus 2 pequeños.   

El préstamo será utilizado para sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrdaos de terreno, con la cual  espera  cultivar el maíz  

Lo que más desea  Domitila es  poder seguir trabajando la tierra, para que a sus hijos no les falte nada  y así  poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de ellos.
texts.en:
Domitila is 22 years old and has a sixth grade education.  She is single and has two children.  Their father left.  Only one goes to school

Domitila has been farming since she was seven years old since her parents were farmer.  She started farming 7,000 square meters of corn on her own, along with her children’s father.  Now it’s just she who cares for her children’s wellbeing.  She continues work raising corn and supporting her children.

She will use the money from this loan to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.

What Domitila wants most is to continue working the land so that her children will not want for anything and she will be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to plant corn.

loans.name: Luyến

texts.en:
Mrs. Luyến works in agriculture raising pigs.

Luyến is 40 years old and is married with 2 children.  She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, in a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with 2 dependents.

This is Luyến's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for 7 years.
The main hardship that Luyến faces in her life is low profit margins.  She is requesting a loan to buy water tank and clean water filter.

With her business profits, Luyến hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, to buy land of her own, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and a clean water filter.

loans.name: Teresa Del Jesús

texts.es:
En el sitio Rio Bravo de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Bankito Rio Bravo.
En este lugar vive la señora Teresa, tiene 67 años de edad, está casada y de esta  relación tienen 10 hijos mayores de edad, tres de ellos aun viven con ellos. Su esposo fabrica ladrillos.
Doña Teresa es una muy buena esposa y madre que para ayudarle a su marido y a sus hijos realiza el crédito para que ellos  lo utilicen en su trabajo, tienen una pequeña fábrica de ladrillos, ellos trabajan todos los días ya  que estos  ladrillos los entregan a comerciantes que llegan hasta el lugar y luego llevarlos a vender a otras ciudades donde son utilizados para la construcción de viviendas, ellos llevan más de 20 años dedicados a esta actividad la cual les permite salir adelante honradamente.
Este crédito es para comprar aserrín, madera y tierra que utilizan para elaborar los ladrillos. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener un camión para ir a vender sus productos y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
The Bankito Rio Bravo communal bank meets every two weeks in Rio Bravo de Montecristi, a city known for its great diversity of products, like the straw hats known in and outside the country.

Teresa lives here.  She is 67 years old, married, and has 10 adult children, three of whom still live with her.  Her husband is a brick maker.

Teresa is very good wife and mother who is asking for this loan to help her husband in his small brick factory.  They work every day and deliver these bricks to merchants who come to their location and take the bricks to other cities where they are used to build houses.  They have been doing this for more than 20 years and it allows them to earn an honest living

This loan is to buy sawdust, lumber, and dirt that will be used to make bricks.  She has been with the communal bank since the beginning and she likes the loans.  Her dream is to have a truck so she can sell her products and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers and foliar fertilizers for her coffee plants.

loans.name: Lita

texts.en:
Lita runs a small stall selling drinks, snacks, and mobile phone airtime credits, and processing bill payments. Lita lives in Garut, a semi-urban area about five hours from Jakarta.  Lita is married.

Lita began working with Ruma two years ago because she wanted to increase her income and business by selling mobile airtime and servicing bill payments. She feels really excited to expand her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. For the last three months, she has around $ 20 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). She took a loan to buy a printer from Kiva to support her business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments (household electricity payment).

loans.use: to buy a printer to process more mobile phone airtime credit transactions and bill payment

loans.name: Lilian Dinora

texts.es: Lilian de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer honesta, trabajadora y sobre todo muy emprendedora. Hace varios años que logro establecer una pequeña tiendita en su hogar de residencia y gracias a Dios y a su arduo trabajo y dedicación el negocio es muy reconocido en la zona por lo que ya cuenta con mucha clientela. Para Lilian es muy importante mantener activo este negocio ya que es su principal fuente de ingresos. Para ella lo más importante son los clientes ya que sabe que manteniéndolos satisfechos con el servicio que presta seguirán prefiriéndola y su negocio seguiría siempre activo tal como es su sueño. Es por esta razón que ha decidido solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en la compra de mercadería para la tienda tales como: huevos, golosinas, azúcar, arroz, leche, frijoles, pan dulce y de más artículos que parezcan atractivos para los clientes. De esta manera espera lograr su sueño de seguir mantenido activo su negocio y por consecuencia tener junto con su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lilian is 43 years old and lives in her own house along with her family. She characterizes for being an honest, hardworking and entrepreneur woman. Years ago she established a small store in her house, and with God’s help and her hard work and dedication, her business got to be well known in the area, giving her a lot of customers. 

For Lilian it is really important to keep the business going, since it is her main source of income. The most important thing for her is her clientele. She knows that by keeping them satisfied with her service, they will keep returning to her business. This is why she has decided to request a loan from INTEGRAL to invest it in the purchase of merchandise, like: eggs, candies, sugar, rice, milk, beans, sweet bread and other items that her customers might be attracted to. With this she hopes to accomplish her dream: keep her business going, and improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy eggs, candies, sugar, rice, milk, beans, sweet bread and other items.

loans.name: Junna

texts.en:
Junna is 45 years old and lives in Naga, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 4 children who are now all school aged. 
Junna had a little store where she sells groceries and other consumable products and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month. She has requested a loan to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products for retail. 
Junna has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries and other consumable products for retail.

loans.name: Belen

texts.en:
Belen is married with 3 children. She is 54 years old and lives in Gata Daku, Clarin, Philippines.
Belen sells assorted goods to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns PHP 2,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 13,000 to restock her store with basic commodities.
Belen has been a member of PMPC for 1 year.  In the future, she hopes to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities.

location.town: Tudela-Gata Daku, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Mind

loans.name: Sruy's Group

texts.en:
Living in a rural village of the Prey Veng district of Sithor Kandal province, Sruy is a 54-year-old widowed mother of seven children. She has been farming rice in the local area. Having been in the business for 34 years, she can earn a daily income of approximately 48,000 KHR and is able to save about 21,000 KHR each day for her future needs. 

This is Sruy's first loan with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund, and she is leading her group to ask for a loan.  As the leader, she is going to use her portion to buy a decent motorbike for her children to commute to work. She hopes to have a decent motorbike for her children.

loans.use: to buy a decent motorbike for her children to commute to work.

location.town: Prey Veng Province, Sithor Kandal district

loans.name: Dede

texts.en:
Dede runs a small stall selling mobile accessories, and mobile phone airtime credits, and processing bill payments. Dede lives in Cianjur, a semi-urban area about four hours from Jakarta.  Dede is married.
 
Dede began working with Ruma one month ago because he wanted to increase his income and business by selling mobile airtime and servicing bill payments. He feels really excited to expand his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments. For the last month, he has around $20 - 30 per day in sales on average (just mobile phone airtime credit sales). He took a loan to get a printer from Kiva to support his business in selling mobile phone airtime credits and servicing bill payments (household electricity payment).

loans.use: to purchase a printer to process more mobile phone airtime credit transactions and bill payments

loans.name: Desarrollo Comunitario Group

texts.es:
El grupo Desarrollo Comunitario está en su Segundo ciclo del programa de comité, donde ellas además están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde 6 integrantes se encuentran por debajo de la línea de pobreza, es decir que deben seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir con niveles medios de ingresos que a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y mediante la venta de productos de limpieza que hace, está luchando por mejorar su vida y ayudar a sus seres queridos.
La Sra. Pide este préstamo para la compra de productos de limpieza para la venta, lo que le ayudará a tener a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group “Desarrollo Comunitario” (Community Development) is in its second loan cycle as part of the committee program. The members have taken a poverty elimination survey and the results indicated that six of them are below the poverty line. In other words, they must continue to strive in order to improve their living conditions.

One of the members is Sra. Maria. Her recent survey indicated that she was at a Level 2 poverty stage, which is to say that with continuous effort and work she will be able to reach an average income level. Maria sells cleaning products and is making the effort to improve her life and help her loved ones.

Maria is requesting a loan in order to buy cleaning products to sell. This will solidify her business plan, which will help to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy cleaning products to sell.

loans.name: Kusumah

texts.en:
Kusumah lives north of Bogor, about two hours from Jakarta. Kusumah manages a small shop selling drinks, gas stoves and mobile phone airtime credit.  Kusumah is married and lives with four persons in the family home.

Kusumah joined Ruma one month ago because she found it interesting to sell mobile phone airtime credits.  With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, Kusumah sees improvements in her shop.  For the last month, she earned an average of $16 - 17 per day in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  She hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions on the weekends.  Her goal for her business is to expand and have more new business in the future.

loans.use: To process more mobile phone credit sales on the weekends

loans.name: Emma

texts.en:
Emma is 51 years old and married with five children, one of whom is in school. Emma works very hard to provide for them.

Emma runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 40000 loan through NWTF in order to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

Emma has been in this business for twelve years and sells a variety of items such as bread, canned goods and other groceries. 

In the future Emma would like to save enough money to expand her business and continue to send her child to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Saraswati

texts.en:
Saraswati (her name refers to the Goddess of Education) is 35 years old and married. She lives with her husband and four children. She sells seasonal fruits and sweets in the market. She travels and sells in six different markets in nearby villages every week. Her husband is into the catering business; he cooks for wedding ceremonies, baby showers, festivals etc. He also helps his wife sell seasonal fruits in the markets. Their family income is approximately INR 4,000-5,000 per month, which is not good enough to lead a quality life. Saraswati hopes to continue operating her business and have more customers.

With an aim to further develop her business, Saraswati is requesting a loan of INR 10,000 to buy more fruits and sweets to stock up for better profit. Her profits from this business will definitely help her sustain the daily needs of her family. She is looking forward to this loan with lots of hope. Saraswati is very grateful to lenders for their support and goodwill.

loans.use: to buy more fruits and sweets to sell

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
En el sitio Rio Bravo de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Bankito Rio Bravo.
En este lugar vive el señor José, tiene 21 años de edad, está soltero y vive en la casa de sus padres. 
Don José es un joven muy trabajador que le gusta trabajar para salir adelante, el en sociedad con su papá se dedican a  la fabricación de ladrillos (material utilizado en la construcción de viviendas), ellos trabajan de lunes a sábado en la elaboración y entrega de este material de construcción muy utilizado en la provincia, ellos llevan a entregar sus productos en un pequeño camión que tienen directamente a sus clientes, así aseguran sus ventas y salen adelante honradamente.
Este crédito es para comprar aserrín, madera y combustible. Esta desde el inicio  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque  los  créditos le ayudan a salir adelante. Sus sueños son comprar un camión más grande.
texts.en:
The Bankito Rio Bravo communal bank meets every two weeks in Rio Bravo de Montecristi, a city known for its great diversity of products, like the straw hats known in and outside the country.

Jose lives here.  He is 21 years old, single, and lives with his parents.  Jose is a hardworking young man who likes to work to get ahead.  He and his father make bricks (used to build homes) and they work Monday through Saturday making and delivering this well-used building material.  They deliver their product with a small truck and earn an honest living securing their sales.

This loan is to buy sawdust, lumber, and fuel.  He has been with the communal bank from the beginning and likes it because the loans help him get ahead.  His dream is to buy a bigger truck.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fuel..

loans.name: Meena

texts.en:
Meena is 25 years old, married, and mother of two children. One of her children is going to school while the other is still a baby. Meena is illiterate but very responsible, gregarious and cheerful by nature. Her husband works in a shop. Additionally, Meena and her husband manage a dairy farm. She initially purchased a cow by taking a loan from the local NGO called “MESP” and repaid that loan successfully. Their family income is around INR 6,000 per month, which is not sufficient for the basic needs of life. She is requesting a loan to buy one more cow as there is a demand for milk. All milk is supplied to the nearby villages of Ghormara or Basukinath
. 
Meena is working tirelessly towards fulfilling her dream of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family and for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Reina De Jesus

texts.es: Reina tiene 29 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su madre, sobrina de 20 años y su hija de 9 años de edad quien se encuentra estudiando en la escuela pública de su localidad. Reina se dedica a la venta de deliciosas tortas desde hace  mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar ya que no cuenta con otra fuente de ingresos. Reina desea invertir en su negocio con el fin de mejorar sus ventas e ingresos que le permitan mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: pan para tortas, aderezos, verduras, carne, etc.
texts.en: Reina is 29 years old and lives with her mother, 20 year old niece, and nine year old daughter who attends the local public school.  Reina sells delicious sandwiches and earns a living this way, since she has no other source of income.  Reina wants to invest into her business so she can increase her sales and income so she can improve her quality of life.  She is asking for a loan through FUSAI so she can buy ingredients such as bread, seasonings, vegetables, meat, etc.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Akli

texts.en:
Women in Indian villages are married very young. By the time they touch 50, many of them are already grandparents and literally classified as old. Akli is no different in the perception of her co-villagers, but she believes the other way round.  

Akli lives and manages her farm in the Jarmundi village, Dumka, Jharkhand. She is married and mother of four children, all of them married with their own families. Her husband is a cook, runs a catering business and earns around INR 5,000. The couple is staying with their grandchildren.
 
Akil got to know about microfinance institutions that help low-income people with financial aid for their projects during the training conducted by the local NGO called “MESP”. 

She is very energetic, hard working and full of confidence. Akli purchased a cow last year, taking a loan from the MESP and sells the milk in her locality, as there is good demand for it. Akil wants to buy another cow for which she needs a loan of INR 10,000. The loan will help her to expand her dairy farm and earn more profit, which will enable her to afford fees for a good school for her grandkids.

India is a land of sweets.  Ghormara, which is about 15 kilometers from Akli’s village, is known for peda, a sweet made with milk. The confectionary makers here are always in need of milk and Aki serves as an ideal supplier. She wants to expand her farm, have more profits and live a comfortable middle-age life.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Maria Cirila

texts.es: Doña Maria de 63 años de edad vive con su hija en casa propia, es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y honrada, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan dulce, salpores, quesadillas, tortas de pan, etc. y sale a venderlo por la colonia donde ella reside, Doña Maria solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así tendrá junto con su hija una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Doña Maria is 63 years old and lives in her own home along with her daughter. She is a very responsible, hardworking, and honest woman. Maria works in her own bakery where she makes sweet bread, sugar cookies, pound cakes, custard cakes, and other baked goods. She sells her products in the neighborhood where she lives.

Doña Maria is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of flour, shortening, baking tins, and all of the other supplies that she needs to produce more. This improvement for her bakery is very important to her and her daughter since it will help them attain a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, shortening, baking tins, and other needed supplies.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose trabaja por las mañanas como secretario auxiliar, vive con su madre y hermanos, también comenta que es huérfano de padre y que sus hermanos le ayudan a poder cubrir los gastos de su facultad, se inspira en estudiar para poder ayudar a su familia y de alguna forma poder ser útil a su comunidad.
Jose pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la paga de las cuotas, y de esa forma podrá seguir estudiando y luchando por cumplir su meta.
texts.en:
Jose works in the mornings as an administrative assistant. He lives with his mother and his siblings. Jose also says that his father is deceased, so his siblings help him with his school expenses. Therefore, he is inspired to study so that he can help his family and become useful in some way to his community.

Jose is requesting a loan so that he can pay his school fees, which will allow him to continue studying in order to accomplish his goal.

loans.use: to pay for his university fees.

loans.name: Lập

texts.en:
Lập is 35 years old, married with 2 children and operates a fishing business. She has been involved in this business for 7 years. Lập lives with her 2 dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. In 2012, Lập joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Lập has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Lập faces in her life is not having a clean water system and hygenic latrine. She is requesting a loan to buy sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

With her business profit, Lập hopes to build a new house, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement and bricks to build a toilet.

loans.name: Diego Arturo

texts.es: Diego es un joven de 23 años de edad, él vive con su esposa y su hijo de 2 años de edad en una casa que les prestan en la hacienda donde trabaja a la ganadería y también se dedica al trabajo en el campo, su esposa se dedica a ayudarle en todo trabajo que él realice, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca, la aspiración de Diego es comprar más vacas para aumentar la venta de leche e incrementar sus ingresos para comprar una casa para su hijo y su esposa.
texts.en:
Diego is a young man who is 23 years of age. He lives with his wife and his two-year-old son in a house that is provided by the estate where he works tending cattle. Diego also engages in farm work. His wife helps him with all of the duties.

The loan he is requesting will be invested in the purchase of a cow. Diego aspires to buy more cows so that he can increase his milk sales and earn more income. This would allow him to buy a house for his wife and son.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Thuận

texts.en:
Mrs. Thuận is 36 years old, married with 2 children and operates a fishing business. Thuận has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She lives with 4 dependents in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province. This is Thuận's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.
